_.displayName: holy symbol (a gift to you when you entered the priesthood)

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: A {@item holy symbol|phb} (a gift to you when you entered the priesthood), a prayer {@item book|phb} or prayer wheel, 5 sticks of incense, vestments, a set of {@item common clothes|phb}, and a belt {@item pouch|phb} containing 15 gp

entries.name: Feature: Shelter of the Faithful
entries: 作为一个圣徒，你能得到那些与你有共同信仰的人的尊重，你可以举行你的神的宗教仪式。你和你的冒险同伴可以在寺庙、神殿或其他你的信仰的既定场所获得免费的治疗和护理，不过你必须提供施法所需的任何物质成分。那些认同你的宗教的人将以适度的生活方式支持你（但仅限于你）。
你也可能与一个专门供奉你所选择的神灵或万神殿的特定寺庙有联系，并且你在那里有一个住所。这可能是你过去服务的寺庙，如果你和它保持良好的关系，或者是你找到新家的寺庙。在你的神庙附近，你可以向祭司们寻求帮助，只要你所要求的帮助没有危险，而且你与你的神庙保持着良好的信誉。

entries.name: Suggested Characteristics
entries: 圣徒是由他们在寺庙或其他宗教团体的经验所塑造的。他们对其信仰的历史和信条的研究，以及他们与寺庙、神殿或等级制度的关系，影响了他们的举止和理想。他们的缺陷可能是一些隐藏的虚伪或异端思想，或者是被带到极端的理想或纽带。

rows: 我把我信仰中的某位英雄作为偶像，并不断提到这个人的事迹和榜样。
我可以在最激烈的敌人之间找到共同点，与他们产生共鸣，并始终致力于实现和平。
我在每个事件和行动中都看到了预兆。诸神试图对我们说话，我们只需要倾听。
没有什么能动摇我的乐观态度。
我几乎在任何情况下都会引用（或错误引用）圣典和谚语。
我容忍（或不容忍）其他信仰，尊重（或谴责）对其他神灵的崇拜。
我在我的寺庙的精英中享受美食、饮料和上流社会。粗糙的生活让我感到厌烦。
我在寺庙里呆得太久了，以至于我没有什么实际的经验与外面世界的人打交道。
传统。崇拜和祭祀的古老传统必须得到保存和维护。(合法的)
慈善。我总是试图帮助那些需要帮助的人，无论个人付出什么代价。(好)
变化。我们必须帮助实现众神在世界中不断进行的变化。(混沌)
权力。我希望有一天能上升到我的信仰的宗教等级制度的顶端。(合法)
信仰。我相信我的神明会指导我的行动。我有信心，如果我努力工作，事情会很顺利。(合法的)
愿望。我试图通过将我的行为与神的教义相匹配来证明自己值得神的青睐。(任何)
我愿意以死来找回我的信仰中早已丢失的古老遗物。
我总有一天会向给我打上异教徒烙印的腐败的寺庙等级制度报仇的。
我的生命归功于父母去世时收留我的牧师。
我所做的一切是为了普通人。
为了保护我所服务的寺庙，我将不惜一切代价。
我寻求保护一个我的敌人认为是异端并试图摧毁的神圣文本。
我对别人的评价很严厉，对自己的评价更严厉。
我太信任那些在我的寺庙等级制度中掌握权力的人了。
我的虔诚有时导致我盲目地相信那些宣称信仰我的神的人。
我的思维不灵活。
我对陌生人持怀疑态度，对他们有最坏的期望。
一旦我选择了一个目标，我就会迷恋上它，而损害我生活中的其他一切。

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: A leather-bound diary, a {@item Ink (1-ounce bottle)|phb|bottle of ink}, an {@item ink pen|phb}, a set of {@item traveler's clothes|phb}, one {@item trinket|phb} of special significance, and a {@item pouch|phb} containing 10 gp

entries.name: Cultural Chameleon
entries: 在成为冒险家之前，你成年后的大部分时间都在远离家乡的地方，生活在与你的亲属不同的人群中。你开始了解这些外国文化和他们的人民的方式，他们最终把你当作他们自己人。有一种文化对你的影响比其他任何文化都大，它塑造了你的信仰和习俗。 选择一个你所采用的文化的种族，或者在采用的文化表中滚动。

rows: Aarakocra
侏儒
Elf
小妖精
半身人
人类
蜥蜴人
Orc

entries.name: Feature: Adept Linguist
entries: 你可以与不说任何你知道的语言的人形生物交流。你必须观察人形生物之间的互动至少1天，之后你会学到一些重要的词汇、表情和手势--足以在初级水平上交流。

entries.name: Suggested Characteristics
entries: 人类学家抛开他们出生的社会，去探索世界其他地方的生活是什么样的。他们寻求了解其他种族和文明是如何生存的--或者为什么他们没有生存。一些人类学家是受知识分子的好奇心驱使，而另一些人则希望得到名声和认可，因为他们是第一个发现新民族、失落部落或古代帝国衰落的真相的人。

rows: 我更喜欢与那些不喜欢我的人在一起，包括其他种族的人。
当涉及到遵守适当的礼仪和当地习俗时，我是一个坚持不懈的人。
我宁愿观察也不愿意干涉
由于生活在有暴力倾向的人中间，我已经对暴力不敏感了。
我愿意冒着生命危险去发现一种新的文化，或者解开一个已故文化的秘密。
当我第一次到达一个新的定居点时，我必须学习它的所有习俗。
发现。我想成为第一个发现失落文化的人。(任何)
距离。一个人不能干涉另一种文化的事务--即使是需要援助的人。(合法)
知识。通过了解其他种族和文化，我们学会了解自己。(任何)
权力。普通人渴望强有力的领导，而我则尽最大努力提供这种领导。(合法)
保护。我必须尽一切可能来拯救一个面临灭绝的社会。(好)
无动于衷。生命是残酷的。如果人们无论如何都会死，那么拯救他们有什么意义呢？(混沌)
我的导师给了我一本充满了传说和智慧的日记。丢失它将使我受到打击。
在原始部落或部族的人中生活过后，我渴望回到这里，看看他们过得怎么样。
几年前，悲剧袭击了我结交的一个孤立社会的成员，我将向他们致敬。
我想更多地了解一种令我着迷的特殊人形文化。
我寻求为一个被消灭的氏族、部落、王国或帝国报仇。
我有一个小饰品，我相信它是找到一个失散多年的社会的关键。
船只让我晕船。
我自言自语，而且不容易交朋友。
我相信我在智力上优于其他文化的人，有很多东西可以教他们。
我在地精、蜥蜴人或兽人中生活，已经养成了一些不愉快的习惯。
我对一切都有抱怨。
我戴着一个部落面具，从不摘下它。

_.displayName: wooden case containing a map to a ruin or dungeon
trinket recovered from a dig site

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: A {@item Map or Scroll Case|phb|wooden case} containing a map to a ruin or dungeon, a {@item bullseye lantern|phb}, a {@item miner's pick|phb}, a set of {@item traveler's clothes|phb}, a {@item shovel|phb}, a {@item two-person tent|phb}, a {@item trinket|phb} recovered from a dig site, and a {@item pouch|phb} containing 25 gp

entries.name: Dust Digger
entries: 在成为冒险家之前，你年轻时的大部分时间都在尘土中爬行，从墓穴和废墟中偷取价值可疑的遗物。虽然你设法卖掉了一些你的发现，并赚取了足够的硬币来购买合适的冒险装备，但你一直保留着一件对你有巨大情感价值的物品。在签名物品表上滚动，看看你有什么，或者从表中选择一个物品。

entries.caption: Signature Item
rows: {@item pole (10-foot)|phb|10-foot pole}
{@item Crowbar|phb}
Hat
{@item Hooded lantern|phb}
勋章
{@item Shovel|phb}
{@item Sledgehammer|phb}
{@item Whip|phb}

entries.name: Feature: Historical Knowledge
entries: 当你进入一个废墟或地牢时，你可以正确地确定其最初的目的，并确定其建造者，无论是矮人、精灵、人类、元帝，还是其他已知的种族。此外，你可以确定超过一个世纪的艺术品的货币价值。

entries.name: Suggested Characteristics
entries: 很少有考古学家能抵挡住未开发的废墟或地牢的诱惑，尤其是当这样的地方是传说的源头，或传言包含着巫师、军阀或皇室的宝藏和遗物。一些考古学家为了财富或名声而掠夺，而另一些人则认为照亮过去或防止世界上最伟大的宝藏落入坏人手中是他们的使命。无论他们的动机是什么，考古学家都结合了一个潦倒的历史学家的素质和一个寻宝的无赖的自制英雄主义。

rows: 我喜欢一个好的谜题或谜团
我是个背包客，从不丢弃任何东西。
对我来说，名声比金钱更重要。
我对偷窃死人的东西毫无顾虑。
我在尘封的古墓中比在文明的中心更快乐。
陷阱并没有让我感到紧张。触发陷阱的白痴才让我紧张。
我可能会失败，但我绝不会放弃。
你可能认为我是个学者，但我喜欢好的争吵。这些拳头是用来打人的。
保存。那件文物属于博物馆。(好)
贪婪。我不会白白拿自己的生命冒险。我期望得到某种报酬。(任何)
死亡之愿。没有什么比从死亡之爪中狭路相逢更令人振奋的了。(混沌)
尊严。死者和他们的物品应该受到尊重。(合法)
不朽。我所有的探索都是为了寻找永生的秘密的计划的一部分。(任何)
危险。每一个伟大的发现都伴随着严重的危险。两者携手并进。(任意)
自从我还是个孩子以来，我就听到了关于一座失落城市的故事。我的目标是找到它，了解它的秘密，并在历史书中赢得我的地位。
我想找到我的导师，他前段时间在一次探险中失踪了。
我有一个友好的对手。我们中只有一个人能成为最好的，而我的目标是证明那就是我。
我不会出售具有历史意义或独一无二的艺术品或其他珍品。
我暗暗地爱上了赞助我进行考古探索的富有的赞助人。
我希望能给图书馆、博物馆或大学带来声誉。
我对一些常见的野生动物有一种秘密的恐惧--在我的工作中，我到处看到它们。
我不能离开一个房间而不去搜索它的秘密门。
当我不在探索地牢或废墟的时候。我就会感到紧张和不耐烦。
我没有时间与朋友或家人相处。我把每一个清醒的时刻都用来思考和准备我的下一次远征。
当可以选择向左走或向右走时，我总是向左走。
除非在完全黑暗的环境中，否则我无法入睡。

_.special: a staff carved with symbols of your tribe

items.name: Skill Proficiencies:
items.entry: {@skill Nature}, plus your choice of {@skill Arcana} or {@skill Survival}

items.name: Languages:
items.entry: {@language Primordial} ({@language Primordial|PHB|Aquan}, {@language Primordial|PHB|Auran}, {@language Primordial|PHB|Ignan}, or {@language Primordial|PHB|Terran}, depending on the elemental affinity of your tribe)

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: A set of {@item traveler's clothes|phb}, a staff carved with symbols of your tribe, an {@item herbalism kit|PHB}, and a belt {@item pouch|phb} containing 10 gp

entries.name: Feature: Elemental Harmony
entries: Growing up surrounded by wild elemental magics has attuned your senses to those chaotic forces, enabling you to subtly bend them to your will. As an action, you channel minor magic involving the element of your chosen Ashari order, giving you one of the following abilities:

entries.name: Pyrah
entries: You instantaneously create and control a burst of flame small enough to light a candle, a torch, or a small campfire. Alternatively, you snuff out a flame of the same size.

entries.name: Terrah
entries: You instantaneously create a small rock no larger than a {@item gold (gp)|PHB|gold coin}. The rock appears in your hand, then turns to dust after 1 minute.

entries.name: Vesrah
entries: You instantaneously create enough hot or cold water to fill a small drinking vessel.

entries.name: Zephrah
entries: You create an instantaneous puff of wind strong enough to blow papers off a desk or mess up someone's hair.

entries.name: Suggested Characteristics
entries: {@book The Ashari|TDCSR|2|The Ashari} hold themselves removed from the rest of Tal'Dorei by their own choice. This makes many Ashari naive to the ways of the world beyond their homes—but it can also make them determined, steadfast, and tightly focused on their goals. Ever since {@creature Keyleth, Voice of the Tempest|TDCSR} and leader of the {@book Zephrah|TDCSR|3|Zephrah}, became a world-renowned hero, the Air Ashari at least have become more familiar to Tal'Dorei's other peoples. They are known to welcome outsiders to their mountaintop enclave, and to take on quests that force them to leave their isolated home.
To learn more about your character's Ashari order, see "{@book The Ashari|TDCSR|2|The Ashari}".

entries.caption: Ashari Personality Traits
rows: I like to keep my hands busy, no matter where I am.
I love to explore new places and meet new people.
I meditate at dawn each day—and I can't stand it when my routine is interrupted.
I like noticing patterns in the world around me, whether or not they mean anything.
I don't let anything—or anyone—stand in the way of my mission.
I'm a plain talker, even with people who outrank me.
I've always got some of my native element with me in some form. (This might be modeling clay, pure water, special burning incense, or a bottled cloud.)
I talk with everyone like I've known them all my life. Because most people I know, I have known all my life!

entries.caption: Ashari Ideals
rows: {@b Destiny}. I believe that everyone has a role to play. Now I just have to find mine. (Neutral)
{@b Community}. It's important to surround yourself with people you can count on, and who will support you. (Good)
{@b Knowledge}. I want to learn everything I can about the Elemental Planes—and maybe even visit them myself. (Neutral)
{@b Freedom}. I don't care what anyone says. Even if it causes problems, the elements must be free. And so should I. (Chaotic)
{@b Structure}. The elements are in harmony when they are free to act as they will, within the safe boundaries set by {@book the Ashari|TDCSR|2|The Ashari}. People are much the same. (Lawful)
{@b Virtuous Cycle}. If I see someone who needs help, I feel compelled to assist them. Surely they'll return the favor someday! (Good)

entries.caption: Ashari Bonds
rows: I have a cousin in another Ashari tribe whom I've never met, but someday I want to visit my extended family.
The leader of my tribe thinks I could be their successor, but I worry that I don't have enough experience to lead my people.
A mysterious person killed a member of my family. I've left home to discover who the killer was—and to seek vengeance.
My older sibling set out on their Aramante a year ago, and I haven't seen them since.
When I was a baby, a {@creature giant eagle} brought me to {@book Zephrah|TDCSR|3|Zephrah}. I love my family, but I often wonder who my birth parents are.
I trust my animal friends more than any humanoid ally.

entries.caption: Ashari Flaws
rows: Big cities are overwhelming. I get nervous when surrounded by people I don't know.
I know all too well that elemental power is dangerous—but I like playing around with it anyway.
I get surly if I go too long without being in contact with my native element.
I think the mission of my people is a fool's errand. They should abandon isolation, let the elements be, and enjoy the pleasures of the world!
I can't stand it when people say one thing and mean another! Just say what you mean!
Ugh, I know it's not right, but I can't help but look down on people who can't manipulate the elements. It's not like it's hard!

items.name: Languages:
items.entry: Two of your choice ({@language Celestial} or {@language Gith|MM} recommended)

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: A set of {@item traveler's clothes|PHB}, a diary, an {@item ink pen|PHB}, a {@item Ink (1-ounce bottle)|PHB|bottle of ink}, and a {@item pouch|phb} containing 10 gp

entries.name: Longevity
entries: You are {@dice 20d6} years older than you look, because you have spent that much time in the Astral Sea without aging.

entries.name: Feature: Divine Contact
entries: You gain the {@feat Magic Initiate||Magic Initiate feat} from the {@book Player's Handbook|PHB} and must choose cleric for the feat.
在星海中，你与一位流浪的神灵擦肩而过。这次相遇是短暂的、非暴力的，但它给你留下了持久的印象。这位神灵认为应该与你分享一个秘密或晦涩的宇宙传说。与你的管理人合作，确定这些知识的细节以及它对活动的影响。
在 "神灵接触表 "上打滚，以确定你遇到的是哪位神灵，或者与你的管理员合作，确定一个更合适的选择。

entries.caption: Divine Contact
rows: 科雷隆，艺术和魔法之神（混沌善）。
泰莫拉
Fharlanghn, god of horizons and travel (neutral good)
Istus, god of fate and destiny (neutral)
努阿达，战争和战士之神（中立）。
Zivilyn, god of wisdom (neutral)
阿龙，生死之神（中立的邪恶）。
赫卡忒，魔法和月亮之神（混乱的邪恶）
Celestian, god of stars and wanderers (neutral)
普塔，知识和秘密之神（合法中立）。

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: A bronze discus or leather ball, a lucky charm or past trophy, a set of {@item traveler's clothes|phb}, and a {@item pouch|phb} containing 10 gp

entries.name: Feature: Echoes of Victory
entries: You have attracted admiration among spectators, fellow athletes, and trainers in the region that hosted your past athletic victories. When visiting any settlement within 100 miles of where you grew up, there is a {@chance 50|50 percent} chance you can find someone there who admires you and is willing to provide information or temporary shelter.

Between adventures, you might compete in athletic events sufficient enough to maintain a comfortable lifestyle, as per the "{@book Practicing a Profession|PHB|8|Practicing a Profession}" downtime activity in chapter 8 of the {@book Player's Handbook|PHB}.

entries.name: Favored Event
entries: 虽然许多运动员练习各种游戏和项目，但大多数人都擅长于一种形式的比赛。掷骰子或从喜欢的项目表中的选项中选择，以确定你擅长的运动项目。

entries.caption: Favored Event
rows: 马拉松
长跑
摔跤
拳击
战车或马匹竞赛
潘克雷特(混合徒手格斗)
Hoplite race (racing in full armor with a unit)
五项全能（跑步、跳远、铁饼、标枪、摔跤）。

entries.name: Suggested Characteristics
entries: 竞争可以在队友和对手之间建立强大的联系，也可以在赛场外点燃激烈的争斗。运动员经常将他们训练中的经验教训应用到他们的一般生活中。

entries.caption: Athlete Personality Traits
rows: 我在体力消耗时感觉最平静，无论是锻炼还是战斗。
我不喜欢闲着。
我有一个日常锻炼的习惯，我拒绝打破。
障碍的存在是为了克服。
当我看到别人在挣扎时，我会主动帮助。
我喜欢交换戏谑和嘲讽。
任何值得做的事情都值得做得最好。
如果人们赞美别人而不赞美我，我就会很恼火。

entries.caption: Athlete Ideals
rows: 竞争。我努力在所有事情上测试自己。(混沌)
胜利。胜利的最好部分是看到我的对手被拉低。(邪恶)
友谊。最牢固的纽带是通过斗争形成的。(好)
人。我努力激励我的观众。(中立)
传统。每个游戏都有规则，竞争环境必须是公平的。(合法的)
成长。胜利和失败中隐藏的教训。(任意)

entries.caption: Athlete Bonds
rows: 我的队友是我的家人。
我将战胜对手，证明自己比他们强。
我的错误导致有人受伤。我不会再犯这种错误。
为了我家的荣誉和荣耀，我将成为最好的人。
训练我的人是我世界中最重要的人。
我努力做到不辜负特定英雄的榜样。

entries.caption: Athlete Flaws
rows: 我沉溺于一个威胁到我的声誉或健康的习惯。
为了赢得比赛，我绝对会做任何事情。
我不理会任何不参赛的人，也不理会任何输给我的人。
我有旧伤遗留的疼痛。
我的任何失败或失败都是因为我的对手作弊。
我必须成为我加入的任何团体的队长。

_.special: scroll containing the text of a law important to you

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: An Azorius insignia, a scroll containing the text of a law important to you, a {@item Ink (1-ounce bottle)|phb|bottle of blue ink}, a {@item ink pen|phb|pen}, a set of {@item fine clothes|phb}, and a belt {@item pouch|phb} containing 10 gp (Azorius-minted 1-zino coins)

entries.name: Feature: Legal Authority
entries: You have the authority to enforce the laws of Ravnica, and that status inspires a certain amount of respect and even fear in the populace. People mind their manners in your presence and avoid drawing your attention; they assume you have the right to be wherever you are. Showing your Azorius insignia gets you an audience with anyone you want to talk to (though it might cause more problems than it solves when you're dealing with incorrigible lawbreakers). If you abuse this privilege, though, you can get in serious trouble with your superiors and even be stripped of your position.

entries.name: Azorius Guild Spells
entries: {@i Prerequisite: Spellcasting or Pact Magic class feature}

For you, the spells on the Azorius Guild Spells table are added to the spell list of your spellcasting class. (If you are a multiclass character with multiple spell lists, these spells are added to all of them.)

entries.caption: Azorius Guild Spells
rows: 坎特里普
{@spell friends}, {@spell message}
1st
{@spell command}, {@spell ensnaring strike}
2nd
{@spell arcane lock}, {@spell calm emotions}, {@spell hold person}
3rd
{@spell clairvoyance}, {@spell counterspell}
4th
{@spell compulsion}, {@spell divination}
5th
{@spell dominate person}

entries: Your magic often takes the form of blue or golden runes floating and glowing in the air in circular patterns or of shimmering azure barriers of magical energy. If you cast {@spell ensnaring strike}, for example, the vines created by the spell might appear as rune-inscribed glowing bands that wrap around the target and hold it in place.

entries.name: Suggested Characteristics
entries: 阿索里乌斯元老院的成员倾向于一种冷酷的尊严和务实的、有秩序的性质。由于他们深受法律的熏陶，他们的理想和优先事项都围绕着法律问题。

entries.caption: Personality Traits
rows: 我尽量不让自己的判断力被情绪所蒙蔽。
我对每天被迫面对的蠢货和粗人有无限的耐心。
当我下达命令时，我希望它能被遵守。
I just want things the way I like them: neat, orderly, and clean.
任何错误的行为都无法逃脱我的监视。
我总是准确地说出我的意思，无论需要多少个字来传达我试图传达的特定细微差别。
我很注重字面意思，不欣赏隐喻或讽刺。
一旦决定了，我就不会改变我的想法。

entries.caption: Ideals
rows: {@b Guild}. My guild is all that really matters. (Any)
{@b Order}. The law is meant to ensure that the gears of society turn smoothly and quietly. (Lawful)
{@b Peace}. The ultimate object of the law is to remove violence from society. (Good)
{@b Compliance}. Coercion is a fine way of ensuring that the laws are obeyed. (Lawful)
{@b Legislation}. The law embodies excellence in its precision and detail. (Lawful)
{@b Punishment}. A public display of consequences is an excellent deterrent for other criminals. (Evil)

entries.caption: Bonds
rows: 我受命于一位阿佐里乌斯的逮捕者，他抓住了杀害我父母的罪犯，使我免遭同样的命运。
我希望有一天能编写法律，而不仅仅是执行法律。
我试图阻止一起谋杀案，但失败了，我发誓要找到并逮捕犯罪者。
我成功地阻止了一起谋杀案，而潜在的犯罪者想要我死。
我的父母之一在行会中很有地位，我很反感经常被人用这个标准来比较。
我以一位备受尊敬的法师或逮捕者为榜样，但我担心我的榜样可能涉及一些非法的事情。

entries.caption: Flaws
rows: 我无法区分法律的文字和精神。
在别人看来，我是一个苛刻的评判者，但我对自己的评判是最苛刻的。
我有一个秘密的、非法的恶习。
我在童年时目睹了一场犯罪，因此受到了创伤。
我没有能力进行欺骗。
我希望自己能加入博罗家族，但我担心他们永远不会接受我。

entries.name: Contacts
entries: The Azorius Senate is a sprawling bureaucracy, and people in a variety of positions throughout the guild can pull strings to make things happen. Because of the guild's role in making and enforcing laws for the entire city, your place in the Azorius can easily bring you into contact with members of other guilds, for good or ill.
Roll twice on the Azorius Contacts table (for an ally and a rival) and once on the Non-Azorius Contacts table.

entries.caption: Azorius Contacts
rows: 在十几岁的时候，我曾是一位著名法官的秘书。
我的一个童年朋友现在是一个为公会服务的预知法师。
I joined the Azorius hoping to impress an arrester whom I admire.
我以前的导师现在是乌泽克的典狱长，这是阿佐里乌斯的新监狱。
在我的法律培训中，我什么都是第二好的，而现在我和那个总是好一点点的人一起工作。
一个好朋友被提拔到工作岗位，他们不能告诉我。
我知道在新普拉赫夫的大厅里有一个同体人，他可以在幕后把事情做好。
有一次，我被传唤到最高法官伊斯佩里亚面前，他是阿索里乌斯的行会会长，他称赞我的工作。

entries.caption: Non-Azorius Contacts
rows: Roll an additional Azorius contact; you can decide if the contact is an ally or a rival.
招募我加入阿索里乌斯的人离开了，加入了博罗斯。
我和一个迪米尔特工有友谊，他有时会向我透露有关阿佐里厄斯活动的秘密。
一个戈尔加里孢子德鲁伊很愿意看到我失手犯法。
一个较小的格鲁尔首领似乎认为我可能有用。
我家的害群之马正在把他们的狂热的天才用在伊兹特上。
I'm friends with an Orzhov advokist; we compare notes on different forms of law magic.
有一次我在拉克多斯的表演中被嘲笑；表演者对我在这方面的良好幽默感印象深刻，现在偶尔会帮我。
我有一个狂热的塞勒斯尼亚表弟，他一直试图招募我和家里的其他人。
在成长过程中，我被一个臭小子欺负，他现在是西米克联合体的一个混血儿。

entries.name: How Do I Fit In?
entries: As a member of the Azorius Senate, you are probably engaged in the work of law enforcement (even if your background involved the legislative or judicial aspects of the senate's activities). Legislative aides and judges' clerks find little reason to venture beyond the Azorius guildhalls, but soldiers and lawmages patrol the streets daily.

An Azorius soldier or lawmage is a force for order, charged with fighting crime on the streets—and in the halls of power. You might spend your time foiling thefts, putting a stop to Orzhov extortion, rooting out Dimir spies, or hunting down Golgari assassins. Perhaps you take your orders from a precognitive mage (or you are one yourself) who receives unpredictable and cryptic visions of future crimes that you and your allies must try to prevent.

items.name: Baldur's Gate Feature: Religious Community
entries: {@note The effects of a Baldur's Gate feature can be used only while the character is in Baldur's Gate—though, at the DM's discretion, they might have applicable effects in situations similar to those in Baldur's Gate.}
你与博德之门的宗教团体联系紧密。你知道某个神灵在这个城市是否有追随者，以及该信仰公开聚集的任何地方和那些信徒通常居住的社区。虽然这对城市中大多数较大的信仰来说并不引人注目，但追踪新来者带来的数百种宗教并不是一件容易的事。

items.name: Baldur's Gate Feature: Long-Lost Heir
entries: {@note The effects of a Baldur's Gate feature can be used only while the character is in Baldur's Gate—though, at the DM's discretion, they might have applicable effects in situations similar to those in Baldur's Gate.}
你精通巴尔杜利亚族长和其他贵族的举止和特质，模仿得很流畅，甚至能让最冷酷的家族首脑相信你的真实性。你能熟练地冒充某些想象中的或已灭绝的族长血统的失散的继承人。
由于你善于把自己伪装成爱国者，所以你有一块守望先锋令牌，允许你单独进入博德之门的上城。你也许能唬住别人，甚至能让守望先锋的成员相信你是个爱国者。然而，任何对你真实性的测试都有可能暴露你的欺骗行为。

items.name: Baldur's Gate Feature: Criminal Connections
entries: {@note The effects of a Baldur's Gate feature can be used only while the character is in Baldur's Gate—though, at the DM's discretion, they might have applicable effects in situations similar to those in Baldur's Gate.}

In Baldur's Gate, crime is just another business. As a result, you can arrange a meeting with a low-ranking operative of nearly any business, patriar family, crew, government institution, or—certainly—the Guild. This operative will hear you out and, at their discretion, take your information or request up their chain of command. These meetings almost always occur in shady venues.

items.name: Criminal Origins
entries: Criminals are pervasive in Baldur's Gate. If you wish, you may roll on the Criminal Origins table for an event that began your life of crime.

entries.caption: Criminal Origins
rows: You crippled a Guild kingpin's cousin without realizing the connection. You got the Guild to back off demands for your death by offering to make amends by working for the criminals, but even so the kingpin still plots a personal revenge.

The Guild took over your family business, ran it into the ground, and burned the building for insurance money. You were driven into crime yourself, but you'll never work for the Guild. You take special joy in hitting its targets first, tipping off its con victims and otherwise frustrating its schemes.

It's always been about money. You're not paid what you're worth, working for someone who has more than they deserve. But the Guild offered you a way to fix that. You keep doing what you've always done—guard work, dock labor, business accounting—but what you learn you pass on to the Guild.

The inequality of Baldur's Gate has driven you to take matters into your own hands. You steal from patriars and rich Lower City residents, funneling the money through charitable fronts to help the needy.

You got into crime as a bored patriar looking for excitement. Your family has no idea of your activities, and neither does the Guild. If either of them ever finds out, your life as you know it will be over.
A close friend or relative joined the Guild and vanished mysteriously. You've worked your way into the lower ranks hoping to find out what happened to them.

You've always wanted to be a member of the Guild. As a child, you looked up to the Guild members' swagger, their flashy dress, and their competence, which all marked them as different from the other adults you knew. As soon as you could, you joined the organization.

To you, this is just a way to earn a living. You go to work, do what needs to be done, and get paid. Anyone who pursues crime for thrill-seeking, to strike back at unjust authorities, or anything else are amateurs, and they're liable to get you arrested or killed with their idiocy.

items.name: Baldur's Gate Feature: Backstage Pass
entries: {@note The effects of a Baldur's Gate feature can be used only while the character is in Baldur's Gate—though, at the DM's discretion, they might have applicable effects in situations similar to those in Baldur's Gate.}
你已经了解到，娱乐业（或任何其他事业）的大部分真正业务都发生在幕后。你很容易知道什么样的观众会去什么地方，比如强壮的人如何聚集在 "脸红的美人鱼"，或者粗鲁的父辈如何聚集在 "舵手和斗篷"。在一次成功的演出之后，你可能会遇到一个热情的观众--某个经常出入该场所的职业或社会阶层的人。这个接触者很高兴与你交谈，并倾听。

items.name: Baldur's Gate Feature: Social Vengeance
entries: {@note The effects of a Baldur's Gate feature can be used only while the character is in Baldur's Gate—though, at the DM's discretion, they might have applicable effects in situations similar to those in Baldur's Gate.}

You've lived your entire life in the Lower or Outer City of Baldur's Gate. You grew up seeing arrogant patriars flaunt their wealth while your hardworking neighbors struggled. As a result, you know how eager commoners in Baldur's Gate are to see any patriar get what they deserve. While in a busy part of the Lower City or Outer City of Baldur's Gate, you can spend {@dice 2d10} minutes to convince {@dice 1d6} {@creature commoner||commoners} to perform a non-illegal act that inconveniences a member of the Watch or Flaming Fist, a patriar, or some other wealthy looking individual.

items.name: Folk Hero Origins
entries: Folk heroes might rise from a variety of circumstances, or their origins might be a secret as they do their work anonymously. If you wish, you may roll on the Folk Hero Origins table for an event that started you down your heroic path.

entries.caption: Folk Hero Origins
rows: You helped get healing for a sick child. Now the sick come to you, knowing you'll help them find a way to salvation.

You helped break a Guild protection racket afflicting a community of immigrants in the Outer City. Now, you can't travel through that part of the city without your dozen adopted grandparents inviting you in for a meal.

Seeing a lost patriar after dark in the Outer City, you guided the wayward noble through back streets to safety. The patriar repaid your help by paying for improved roofs and lamps in your neighborhood, causing the entire community to celebrate your deed.

Fueled by alcohol, you faced down a carrion crawler that slunk out of the sewer, knocking it out with a single punch. Since then, however, the ale you once credited with your heroism has drowned it, and even your most patient admirers are losing hope. You're hoping for one last chance to win back the goodwill you've drunk away.
You once defeated a raging bugbear with a hand mirror, a mounted deer's head, and two kicks to the groin. Later, you and the bugbear became friends.
Last winter, you dove into the frigid river to haul out a foundering fishing boat with your bare hands, saving all aboard. Now, everyone on the docks knows your name.

items.name: Baldur's Gate Feature: Professional Courtesy
entries: {@note The effects of a Baldur's Gate feature can be used only while the character is in Baldur's Gate—though, at the DM's discretion, they might have applicable effects in situations similar to those in Baldur's Gate.}

You're familiar with the city's crews, their territories, and inter-crew politics. Choose one of the three districts of Baldur's Gate: the Upper City, the Lower City, or the Outer City. This is the district where you conduct most of your business. Whenever you need information about something in one of that district's neighborhoods, you can seek out crew members in that area and learn the local gossip. You can also gain unimpeded entry to nearly any bank, guild hall, place of business, workhouse, or crew meeting place in your district.

items.name: Baldur's Gate Feature: The Real City
entries: {@note The effects of a Baldur's Gate feature can be used only while the character is in Baldur's Gate—though, at the DM's discretion, they might have applicable effects in situations similar to those in Baldur's Gate.}

You know the Baldur's Gate most Baldurians ignore, the dog-eat-dog world of the homeless and unfortunate. You know where to go in the Lower City and Outer City for anonymity. In these slums and alley camps, you can get a damp bed and a bad meal, but also a degree of privacy and no questions asked. Living here isn't comfortable, but it's unlikely anyone will find you—and you can stay as long as you want.

items.name: Hermit Origins
entries: Any number of personal choices or ill-fated circumstances might have led you to turn away from society. You may, if you wish, choose or roll an origin event from the Hermit Origins table.

entries.caption: Hermit Origins
rows: You led an ill-fated expedition into the Riverveins. Your friends were swept away by flooding, and you've never been able to shake the guilt of causing their deaths over a frivolous lark. You've maintained a solitary vigil outside the cavern entrance ever since.
You crossed the Guild in a bad way. Fortunately, its members think you're dead. Less fortunately, maintaining that deception might require you to stay in hiding until you actually are.

You study the puzzles of mortal natures. You've seen followers of evil deities perform miracles for the helpless at Twin Songs, and you've seen patriars who worship good deities turn their backs on the poor daily. Bearing witness to such things, and meditating on their contradictions, fills your hours.

You tend to some part of the city's forgotten history: the unmarked graves in Cliffside Cemetery, the crumbling remains of dead patriar families' manors, or a collection of religious texts stuffed into an attic and forgotten when a believer's patron deity died. In this solitary work, you've learned secrets no one else knows.
You killed a patriar's scion in an illegal duel. The family swore revenge, and you fled to the slums rather than risk bringing their wrath down on your kin.

You aren't originally from Baldur's Gate. You came here seeking something else, only to learn that the quest that drove you had become impossible to fulfill—its object was destroyed or its purpose was negated by some superseding event. Suddenly directionless and unable to return to your homeland, you have lingered, adrift, in this wretched city.

items.name: Baldur's Gate Feature: Patriar
entries: {@note The effects of a Baldur's Gate feature can be used only while the character is in Baldur's Gate—though, at the DM's discretion, they might have applicable effects in situations similar to those in Baldur's Gate.}
作为博德之门精英家族的一员，你可以在不支付通行费的情况下通过城门，不受质疑地混迹于门内的贵族之中，并给那些寻找富人赞助的人留下好印象。你在上城受到欢迎，可以在天黑后留在那里而不被骚扰或驱逐。你的话语比别人的话语更容易被接受，而且守卫或政府官员中的任何腐败行为都会对你有利，而不是对你不利--至少在你努力揭发它之前是如此。

items.name: Baldur's Gate Feature: Immigrant Experience
entries: {@note The effects of a Baldur's Gate feature can be used only while the character is in Baldur's Gate—though, at the DM's discretion, they might have applicable effects in situations similar to those in Baldur's Gate.}

Even after your short time in Baldur's Gate, you've learned the city holds more walls and gates than those the Watch and Flaming Fist patrols. You are known within the city's immigrant communities. Should you ever need to learn about a foreign land, people, tradition, or history, you know where to find someone with firsthand experience—likely somewhere in the Outer City.

items.name: Outlander Origins
entries: Foreigners of all kinds come to Baldur's Gate daily, drawn by countless reasons from countless lands. The Outlander Origins table provides ideas for how your character might have come to Baldur's Gate.

entries.caption: Outlander Origins
rows: Someone stole something precious from your people. You tracked the thief to the city gates, but finding clues in an urban environment is very different from tracking someone across the wilderness. You don't know where to go from here, but your people need you to succeed.

You've always been fascinated by the glitter and glamor of city life, so different from the slow pace of life in your homeland. Now you're here, ready to make your mark in the world, but unsure how to begin.

War, plague, famine, or a marauding monster ravaged your home, forcing you to flee for your life. You don't even know how many of your people survived or where to find them. Alone or accompanied by a handful of equally bereft survivors, you must navigate a new life that you never asked for.
You were captured by kidnappers and taken far from your home. The Knights of the Unicorn freed you and brought you here, but now you're on your own.

You were exiled for breaking a trivial-seeming taboo. For this seemingly minor transgression, you lost your friends, family, and homeland in one fell swoop, and were given little choice but to strike out on your own.

A peddler once brought something astonishing to your homeland—a Gondan clockwork, shimmering cloth of gold, a trained speaking bird, or some other small wonder—and told you that it came from Baldur's Gate. You've come to see the source of such wonders, and perhaps learn to create them.

items.name: Baldur's Gate Feature: Rumor Monger
entries: {@note The effects of a Baldur's Gate feature can be used only while the character is in Baldur's Gate—though, at the DM's discretion, they might have applicable effects in situations similar to those in Baldur's Gate.}

Via your personal rumor mill and articles published in Baldur's Mouth, you can surmise a great deal about Baldurians' secrets—who's practicing necromancy, who's involved in spying or smuggling, who would purchase or craft dangerous magical wares without batting an eyelash. Whenever a noteworthy crime or mysterious happening occurs in the city, you immediately have a list of {@dice 1d4} suspects who, if they aren't involved, have a strong chance of knowing who is.

items.name: Baldur's Gate Feature: Smuggler's Sense
entries: {@note The effects of a Baldur's Gate feature can be used only while the character is in Baldur's Gate—though, at the DM's discretion, they might have applicable effects in situations similar to those in Baldur's Gate.}
你熟悉博德之门的码头，熟悉检查员和收税员的行动，熟悉货物和钱币的流动方式。因此，你很容易将一车货物运上岸，或将这些货物送上合作的船只，而不引起怀疑或征税。你也知道灰衣人的行动--火焰之拳的港口守卫--并且对如何操作城市的机械化起重机有一定的了解。

items.name: Baldur's Gate Feature: City Guard
entries: {@note The effects of a Baldur's Gate feature can be used only while the character is in Baldur's Gate—though, at the DM's discretion, they might have applicable effects in situations similar to those in Baldur's Gate.}

You may choose to currently serve in either the Flaming Fist or the Watch. If you do, you have responsibilities related to your post. For as long as you perform these responsibilities, you gain benefits. If you stop performing your responsibilities, though, you lose access to the benefits and might suffer further fallout. Should you lose these benefits, you may regain them by having an unpleasant conversation with your commanding officer and fulfilling your responsibilities for a month.

entries.name: Flaming Fist
entries: If you serve in the Flaming Fist, once every ten days, you must report to the Seatower of Balduran for training, and you're required to take a regular shift patrolling either the Lower City or the Outer City. In return, you have access to the Flaming Fist's fortresses and a direct line of communication with Flaming Fist officers and other soldiers. You can also pass through the city's gates without question—although you can't bring guests into the Upper City as a member of the Watch might. Additionally, you're always welcome at the Three Old Kegs, where the Three Old Toads are glad to greet you with a smile and a mug of ale.

entries.name: The Watch
entries: If you serve in the Watch, you're required to conduct a regular patrol in the Upper City or take a regular shift at its gates, and must report for training in the Watch Citadel once every ten days. In return, you have access to the Citadel and a direct line of communication with Watch officers and officials. Your word carries considerable weight in the High Hall, and most establishments in the Citadel Streets neighborhood are happy to give you and your friends free meals. Additionally, you can escort people into the Upper City without question, regardless of whether they are patriars or have Watch tokens. Outside the Upper City, however, most people regard you with suspicion, and you generally get a chilly reception while in uniform.

items.name: Baldur's Gate Feature: Loyalty Test
entries: {@note The effects of a Baldur's Gate feature can be used only while the character is in Baldur's Gate—though, at the DM's discretion, they might have applicable effects in situations similar to those in Baldur's Gate.}

You've had enough dealings with crooked soldiers that you can spot the behaviors common to corrupt guards and military officers a mile away. While awareness of such corruption doesn't equate to evidence of it, and your sense certainly isn't foolproof, your instinct proves a useful starting point when determining who might take a bribe, who might turn a blind eye to a crime, or who might have criminal connections. You can also use this sense to get a feeling about who might fulfill their duties strictly by the book.

items.name: Baldur's Gate Feature: Gateguide Connection
entries: {@note The effects of a Baldur's Gate feature can be used only while the character is in Baldur's Gate—though, at the DM's discretion, they might have applicable effects in situations similar to those in Baldur's Gate.}

Even though you might not be a member of the Gateguides crew, you've associated with enough of them that you know their torch-based code. From the lighting, placement, and type of torch arranged on or near a structure, you can gather a great deal of information about those who live or do business there, particularly if they deal fairly with strangers, have Guild or government connections, or have either helped or denied the Gateguides in the past.

_.special: object you received as your cut from a successful robbery

items.name: Tool Proficiencies
items.entry: {@item Disguise kit|PHB}, one type of {@filter Gaming Set|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=gaming set} or {@filter Musical Instrument|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument}

items.name: Equipment
items.entry: a knife, a cooking pot, a winter {@item blanket|phb}, an object you received as your cut from a successful robbery, a set of {@item common clothes|phb}, and a {@item pouch|phb} containing 10 gp

entries.name: Bandit Specialty
entries: The Bandit Coalition is a rather loose organization of rogues and brigands, but there is still a degree of specialization within the ranks. This ensures that everyone knows what their job is and lessens confusion in the heat of a robbery. You can select your bandit specialty from the Bandit Specialty table, or roll randomly.

rows: Lookout
Lifter
Thug
Runner
Hustler
Captain

entries: {@b {@i Lookouts}} typically watch the roads for any signs of Perch Guard patrols, signalling the team to bail if a heist looks too risky. They also keep an eye out for potential marks.
{@b {@i Lifters}} are the specialist thieves of an operation. They are usually as adept at pick-pocketing as they are at sneaking up behind a cart to liberate its valuables.

{@b {@i Thugs}} are the muscle of a bandit group, and use their size and strength to intimidate merchants into giving up without a fight. They also keep other bandits in line, at the captain's discretion.

{@b {@i Runners}} are the messengers and scouts of the Coalition, serving to smuggle pilfered goods to fences. Additionally, they pass information throughout the different camps of the organization. Their job often finds them working alone which makes them particularly vulnerable.

{@b {@i Hustlers}} are inveterate con-artists. Through careful planning and execution, their diversions can keep cart drivers occupied just long enough for the lifters to do their work, or create a seamless opening for an ambush.

{@b {@i Captains}} are the glue that holds each bandit team together, providing leadership, and stamping out dissention where necessary, often with force. They are figures that inspire with their skill and bravado.

entries.name: Feature: Bandit Routes
entries: As someone who once assisted in countless highway robberies, you are familiar with the roads of the Wood and escape paths used by bandits. When you are not in combat, you (and companions you lead) can travel between locations that cut through forested areas twice as fast as your speed would normally allow.

entries.name: Suggested Characteristics
entries: Those who have chosen to leave the Coalition behind have not made the choice lightly. Some wrestle with their doubts, still caring deeply about the friends they left behind, while others have forsaken their former lives entirely.

rows: I am plucky and confident in my abilities, at least, that's what I want others to think.
I often crack jokes to lighten the mood.
I like to keep my secrets, and those who try to pry into my life irritate me.
I have trouble sleeping unless I'm on the ground (or floor) in my bedroll.
I picked up many stories during my time on the road, and I have one for every occasion.
You mess with my friends, you mess with me.
I never really had a plan in life, I tend to just go with the flow.
I'm as cautious as they come.
Repentance. I've done terrible things in the past, and I want to try and make up for them. (Good)
Nature. I've seen what's happening to the forest, and it's bigger than all of us. We're all doomed unless we do something about it. (Neutral)
Friendship. My friends are like family to me, and I'll keep trying to do right by them until the end. (Good)
Self-Preservation. Any good rat knows when it's time to flee a sinking ship. I want to be clear of the Bandit Coalition when it goes down. (Evil)
Compassion. The struggle between humblefolk and birdfolk will only lead to more bloodshed. It needs to stop somewhere. (Good)
Freedom. I just want to be free to live my own life, and make my own way in the world. (Chaotic)
I did some hard time in Alderheart's prison, and the perch guard who arrested me still has it out for me.
I stole something valuable from the Captain of my unit. I'm in big trouble if they ever find me.
I harbor a terrible secret that might change how people think of me if it got out.
I still sympathize with the Coalition's aims, I just believe there's a better way.
My friends in the Coalition didn't understand why I had to leave. They've branded me a traitor.
I had people in the Coalition who looked up to me as a leader. They might still follow me, if I could only reach them.
I'm always ready to bail when something goes wrong.
Whenever I see something valuable, I can't help but think of a way to steal it.
It's hard for me to trust people. I've been burned before.
I have a problem with authority. Nobody tells me what to do.
There's a warrant out for my arrest.
I have a bad habit that I picked up on the road.

_.special: writ of free agency signed by the Lord Regent

items.name: Tool Proficiencies:
items.entry: {@item Disguise kit|phb}, and one type of {@filter artisan's tools|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=artisan's tools} or {@filter gaming set|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=gaming set}

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: {@item Disguise kit|phb}, {@item common clothes|phb}, a Tears of Virulence {@item emblem|phb}, a writ of free agency signed by the Lord Regent, a set of {@filter artisan's tools|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=artisan's tools} or {@filter gaming set|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=gaming set} you are proficient with, and a {@item pouch|phb} with 15 gp (payment for services rendered).

entries.name: Lifestyle
entries: 中等水平

entries.name: Overview
entries: 你是 "邪恶之泪 "的线人，他们现在统治着普兰市，但同时也是普兰市原镇守部队 "黑拳 "的双重间谍。你的任务是为 "恶灵之泪 "探寻普兰的地下犯罪组织、叛乱组织和普兰的普通民众的秘密。作为对异见者、罪犯和其他叛乱分子活动的报告的交换，"毒泪 "让你独自在和平中处理你的事务。
在现实中，你为被废黜的黑拳组织工作，与经常帮助黑拳组织和其他弗兰叛乱分子的病毒之泪分享错误信息。
自从撤离普兰后，你今天比以前更忙了，因为难民中的异议者人数每天都在增加，同时你有很多机会监视穆尔马斯特和艾尔文特里的人民，让你在病毒之泪中的联系人感到高兴。

entries.name: Feature: Double Agent
entries: You have a reliable and trusty contact within the Tears of Virulence garrison in Phlan to whom you pass information and secrets. In exchange, you can get away with minor criminal offenses within the town of Phlan. In addition, your Black Fists contacts can help you secure an audience with the Lord Regent, the Lord Sage, members of the Black Fists, or deposed nobles and authority figures who are sympathetic to the Phlan refugees and insurgents. Note: This feature is a variant of the Noble feature.

rows: 人们只有在你对他们有价值的情况下才值得信赖。始终努力成为周围最有价值的人。
我的口才和修养是我用来避免自己引起怀疑的工具。
我是一个追求刺激的人，对秘密和危险的任务感到兴奋。
我靠自己的智慧生活，总是对每把锁检查两次，只是为了确定。
我从不承认我的错误，以免它们被用来对付我。
我尽一切努力使自己不被人注意，融入人群。路人很少对我多看一眼。
我已经为任何可能发生的情况做好了准备；包括我作为间谍的作用结束的那一天。
我总是在行动之前确定了解我的敌人，以免我咬牙切齿。
多疑。根据我的经验，每个人都有隐藏的东西，而他们隐藏的东西通常可以伤害我。(任何)
隐秘。我以秘密为交易对象，不打算让我的任何秘密泄露。(任何)
享乐主义者。生命是短暂的。我尽情地享受生活，因为我知道任何一天都可能是我的最后一天。(混沌)
无私。我利用我的地位帮助受压迫的人避免受到当局的迫害。(好)
爱国的。我是弗兰及其领导人的忠实支持者，并认为我的角色是防止无政府状态的庄严职责和必要的罪恶。(合法的)
操纵性。我利用我的知识来勒索和操纵他人，使自己受益。(邪恶)
我被诬陷犯了我没有犯的罪，并寻求将真正的罪犯绳之以法。
我是一个地下网络的一部分，在被当局突击检查之前将无辜的平民偷运出城市。
我怀念弗兰的光辉岁月，在巨龙到来之前。
我寻求证明自己有资格加入黑拳组织，成为他们的一员。
我的妹妹被 "病毒之泪 "杀死了，现在只要有可能，我就给他们提供虚假信息。
我的家人被错误地监禁，我充当线人，以确保他们获释。
我太看得起自己了，有一种夸张的自我感觉。
我很难相信陌生人。我到处看到间谍和线人。
多年来，我因轻微犯罪而逃脱，使我相信自己凌驾于法律之上，并拥有高于我职位的外交豁免权。
多年来看到无辜的人受苦，使我对未来感到绝望和悲观。
我对复仇的渴望常常使我陷入困境。
我挥霍无度，与我最喜欢的酒馆的顾客分享我的财富。

_.special: tattered piece of a Boros banner (a souvenir from a famous battle)

items.name: Languages:
items.entry: 从天人、龙人、哥布林或牛头人中选择一个。

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: A Boros insignia, a feather from an angel's wing, a tattered piece of a Boros banner (a souvenir from a famous battle), a set of {@item common clothes|phb}, and a belt {@item pouch|phb} containing 2 gp (Boros-minted 1-zino coins)

entries.name: Feature: Legion Station
entries: You have an established place in the hierarchy of the Boros Legion. You can requisition simple equipment for temporary use, and you can gain access to any Boros garrison in Ravnica, where you can rest in safety and receive the attention of medics. You are also paid a salary of 1 gp (a Boros-minted 1-zino coin) per week, which (combined with free lodging in your garrison) enables you to maintain a poor lifestyle between adventures.

entries.name: Boros Guild Spells
entries: {@i Prerequisite: Spellcasting or Pact Magic class feature}
对你来说，博罗公会法术表上的法术被添加到你的法术等级的法术列表中。(如果你是一个拥有多个法术列表的多类角色，这些法术将被添加到所有的列表中）。

entries.caption: Boros Guild Spells
rows: 坎特里普
{@spell fire bolt}, {@spell sacred flame}
1st
{@spell guiding bolt}, {@spell heroism}
2nd
{@spell aid}, {@spell scorching ray}
3rd
{@spell beacon of hope}, {@spell blinding smite}
4th
{@spell death ward}, {@spell wall of fire}
5th
{@spell flame strike}

entries: 你的魔法经常以戏剧性的火焰或光芒的爆发为特征。当你对你的盟友施展有益的法术时，他们会瞬间被明亮的火光所包围。

entries.name: Suggested Characteristics
entries: The Boros Legion is a zealous army, full of righteous energy tempered with military discipline. Its members share its leadership's devotion to the ideals of justice, or they find satisfaction in the more warfare-oriented aspects of the legion's work.

entries.caption: Personality Traits
rows: 我以同样高度的军事精确度对待每一项任务。
我总是第一个进入战场的人。
我以坚忍不拔的纪律承受任何伤害或侮辱。
我的公义之怒很容易被最轻微的不义行为所激怒。
对我来说，我的荣誉比我的生命更重要。
危险的工作最好是由一个有秩序的团体以共同的目的来完成。
我以敬畏之心对待我的武器、制服和徽章，因为它们是天使的礼物。
我站着的时候踱步，被迫坐着的时候不停地烦躁。

entries.caption: Ideals
rows: {@b Guild}. My guild is all that really matters. (Any)
{@b Justice}. Achieving justice requires establishing fair, equitable, and compassionate relationships within a community. (Good)
{@b Protection}. It isn't right for innocents to suffer because of the arrogance of the powerful. (Good)
{@b Solidarity}. It is most crucial to act with a single will, marching side by side in perfect accord. (Lawful)
{@b Order}. Society functions only if people do their duty and respect the chain of command. (Lawful)
{@b Conviction}. Anything worth doing is worth doing with your whole heart. (Lawful)

entries.caption: Bonds
rows: 我愿意为奥瑞利亚和天使们献出我的生命。
我的生活要归功于博罗队长，他在我流落街头时收留了我。
我的军团成员就是我的家人。
为了我们家族的荣誉，我挥舞着我的祖父母所做的同样的波洛斯武器。
我年轻时曾与拉克多人一起逃亡，我正在努力为我过去的错误行为赎罪。
我尽我所能帮助在战斗中牺牲的战友的配偶。

entries.caption: Flaws
rows: 当我在一群人中时，我表现得很勇敢，但当我独自一人时，我是个懦夫。
我把一切都看得清清楚楚，黑白分明。
我只是对格鲁尔人的方式有点着迷。
我对指挥系统的信任胜过一切，甚至胜过我最亲密的朋友。
我对其他公会的成员信任得很慢。
在适度贿赂的帮助下，我已经知道对不公正现象视而不见。

entries.name: Contacts
entries: The ordered structure of the Boros Legion offers abundant opportunities to make friends—and rivals—in higher places. You might have close friends in other guilds that share the Boros emphasis on order and community, or bitter enemies among the guilds that represent chaos and destruction.
Roll twice on the Boros Contacts table (for an ally and a rival) and once on the Non-Boros Contacts table.

entries.caption: Boros Contacts
rows: 一位曾经的战友被提拔为著名的太阳神卫队。
One of my parents is a ranking Boros officer.
A close friend serves aboard the {@i Parhelion II}, a flying fortress.
我和一个波罗斯驻军队长有过一段纠缠不清的事情。
我一直与我在地平线军事学院的一位教官保持着关系。
我与一位同学竞争地平线军事学院的导师的关注。
招募我加入军团的人改变了我的生活轨迹。
一个波罗的海的天使知道我的名字。

entries.caption: Non-Boros Contacts
rows: One of my siblings is an Azorius arrester.
Roll an additional Boros contact; you can decide if the contact is an ally or a rival.
我对一个受伤的、现在感激不尽的迪米尔间谍表示怜悯。
我怀疑我认识的人是戈尔加里刺客，但我无法证明。
一位青少年亲戚在一次叛乱中跑去加入格鲁尔，至今仍未回来。
我曾经结识了一位伊泽特科学家，虽然关系结束得很混乱，但我们仍然很友好。
我欠一个奥尔乔夫集团的金钱债务。
一个拉克多斯血巫师似乎很喜欢骚扰我。
我试图招募一个朋友，他最后加入了塞勒斯尼亚。
我一直遇到一个特殊的西米奇生物学家，我很享受不可避免地产生的争论。

entries.name: How Do I Fit In?
entries: 作为博罗军团的一员，你要服从上级军官的命令。你去天使叫你去的地方，你做他们命令你做的事，尽你的能力。如果你享有某种程度的独立性，那要么是因为你已经证明自己有能力在没有密切监督的情况下工作，要么是因为你是一个叛逆的人，愿意现在不服从命令，以后面对后果。

As a soldier on the street, you are tasked with bringing dangerous threats like the Rakdos and the Gruul in line. You might contend with Rakdos performances gone horribly out of control, Gruul raids on outlying neighborhoods, shipments of rot-infested vegetation from the Golgari undercity, and violent uprisings among the guildless. At the same time, you might have to worry about Dimir spies infiltrating your leadership, overzealous or corrupt Azorius senators abusing the law at the expense of justice, Izzet experiments leveling city blocks, and Simic creations that break out of laboratories and wreak havoc through the Tenth District.

entries.name: Tajic, Blade of the Legion
entries: 塔吉克是一名火拳手，拥有军团之刃的崇高称号，使他的级别仅次于天使。他与奥蕾莉亚保持着密切的沟通，尽管最近城市中发生的事件使他们产生了矛盾。塔吉克认为，博罗人只能信任博罗人。他相信，如果没有行会契约，任何行会之间的和平努力都注定要失败。他认为，博罗人最好把精力花在使自己更强大上，这样他们就能维护现在存在的脆弱的平衡，并在平衡发生倾斜时保护无辜者。奥瑞莉娅认为，他的消极态度有可能毒害其他博罗人的心，破坏任何和平努力。在大多数情况下，为了尊重天使，塔吉克对自己的观点保持沉默。

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: A {@item whip|phb}, a {@item two-person tent|phb}, a regional map, a set of {@item traveler's clothes|phb}, and a belt {@item pouch|phb} containing 10 gp

entries.name: Lifestyle
entries: Poor

entries.name: Overview
entries: 你已经习惯了在路上的生活。你为自己走遍了月海地区的每一条主要贸易道路而自豪，包括最好的小路和捷径。当你在这些道路上旅行时，你知道哪里有最好的旅店、露营地和水源，以及潜在的危险地点，例如埋伏。像你一样长期在路上工作，你已经结识了许多人，并发现很容易收集到信息和从城镇到城镇的传言。你能熟练地驾驭牲畜，处理和修理各种马车。

entries.name: Feature: Wagonmaster
entries: You are used to being in charge of the operation and your reputation for reliability has you on a short list when the job is critical. Experience has taught you to rely on your gut. Others recognize this and look to you for direction when a situation gets serious. You are able to identify the most defensible locations for camping. If you are part of a caravan outfit, you are able to attract two additional workers that are loyal to you based on your reputation. You have an excellent memory for maps and geography and can always determine your cardinal directions while traveling. Note: This feature is a variant of the Outlander feature.

rows: 任何团体只有在其最薄弱的环节才会强大。每个人都必须承担自己的责任。
总有人在外面试图夺取我所得到的东西。永远保持警惕。
如果你有合适的老师，任何东西都可以学到。大多数人只是需要一个机会。
早睡早起；这一点至少是在我的控制之下。
你可以听我的，也可以不听，并希望你听了。每个人最终都会站在这道篱笆的一边。
最终我的努力工作会得到回报。也许那个时候终于来了。
一头强壮的牛或马比我遇到的大多数人都更可靠。
我从来没有时间看书，但希望我有。我钦佩那些花时间学习的人。
服务。利用我的才能帮助他人是帮助自己的最好方式。(好)
自私。人们不知道的东西会伤害他们，但这为什么是我的问题？(邪恶)
流浪者。我走到哪里，道路就带到哪里。有时这是件好事... (混沌)
最合适的。在开放的道路上，自然法则获胜。受害者是没有准备的人。(合法的)
专注。我只是有工作要做，而且我要去做。(中立)
有动力。我擅长做的事情是有原因的，我注意到了细节。(任何)
我哥哥在埃尔姆伍德有一个农场，我曾帮助他和他的邻居把货物搬到穆尔马斯特和其他周边城镇。这些人都是好人。
我领导的一个商队被强盗袭击，许多无辜者死亡。我发誓，我将为他们报仇，杀死我遇到的任何强盗。
士兵们大多是好人，他们了解保护道路的重要性。城市守望者是你必须要注意的人。如果他们正在检查你的货物，请准备好支付罚款。
南路塔的新指挥官霍尔克上尉明白安全道路的重要性。他雇用我做了几项工作，我很感激。
总有一条我以前没有走过的路。我一直在寻找新的地方来探索。
如果没有想去哪里就去哪里的自由，财富和权力就没有什么意义。
我很难相信我刚认识的人。
我喜欢开放的道路。地下和狭小的空间让我非常紧张。
我希望其他人听从我的命令，如果他们不听从，我也不会尊重或同情。
我非常骄傲，当我做错事时很难承认。
一旦我决定了行动方案，我就不会动摇。
我喜欢探索，而我的好奇心有时会让我陷入困境。

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: {@item Disguise kit|phb}, a set of {@item fine clothes|phb}, and a belt {@item pouch|phb} containing 30 gp.

entries.name: Feature: Name Dropping
entries: You know and have met any number of powerful people across the land—and some of them might even remember you. You might be able to wrangle minor assistance from a major figure in the campaign, at the DM's discretion. Additionally, the common folk treat you with deference, and your heritage and the stories you tell might be good for a free meal or a place to sleep.

entries.name: Suggested Characteristics
entries: 名人冒险家的后代必须处理不属于他们的名声，他们没有赚到的财富，以及他们永远无法希望达到的期望。这些困难可能会产生不利影响，但那些应对这些困难的人可以达到一个体面的态度和一个接地气的世界观。那些失败的人则会变得痛苦，或者更糟。

rows: 我将永远无法摆脱我著名的父母的阴影，没有人会理解这种负担。
我已经看到了足够多的冒险生活，对我的同龄人有现实的期望和同情。
不辜负我的遗产将是困难的，但我要去做。
我已经习惯了生活中最好的东西，而这是一个很难打破的习惯。
我的父母教给我一种责任感。我努力维护它，即使是在困难重重的情况下。
没有人能够像我一样假装微笑、握手或感兴趣的点头。
自从我到了可以走路的年龄，我就一直是冒险生活的一部分。让我向你解释一些事情。
为了打败我的敌人......并拿走他们的东西，任何风险都不会太大。
权力。在这个世界上出人头地的唯一方法是获得权力，并全力以赴地抓紧它。(邪恶)
和平。那些能在周围混乱的世界中找到或实现和平的人拥有一切。(合法的)
名声。我已经看到了名声能带来什么。而我将不惜一切代价为自己得到这一切。(中立)
训练。艰苦的工作、牺牲和训练导致成功--最终达到完美。(任何)
隐姓埋名。我想获得成功。而且是独自一人。在我和世界上的其他人之间有很多警卫和病房。(任意)
智慧。物质财富是一种幻觉。智慧才是真正的财富。(好)
当我的父母外出冒险时，一个仆人抚养我，我比任何人都关心那个人。
我认为我父母以前的冒险队的每一个成员都是家人。
尽管他们不在，但我那著名的父母却很善良和慷慨。我爱他们，想让他们感到骄傲。
我的父母曾经把一件被诅咒的魔法物品带回家。这是我的执念。
我童年的家承载着我所有最美好的回忆，它的维护是我最关心的问题。
在我的成长过程中，我有一个想象中的朋友，我总是可以依靠。这个朋友现在仍然和我在一起。
你不知道我正在经历什么。你永远不可能。
你。去拿我的斗篷。也许还可以帮我擦一下脚。
我的战友们很勇敢，但我必须独自打败这个威胁，以证明我的价值。
哦，对了，那个咒语？以我父母的好朋友命名的。让我告诉你他们的情况。
我最好的日子已经过去了。前面只有辛劳、痛苦和死亡。
你必须为自己着想。没有人愿意。

a.special: stoppered bottles filled with colored liquid

d.special: signet ring of an imaginary duke

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: A set of {@item fine clothes|phb}, a {@item disguise kit|phb}, tools of the con of your choice (ten stoppered bottles filled with colored liquid, a set of weighted dice, a deck of marked cards, or a signet ring of an imaginary duke), and a belt {@item pouch|phb} containing 15 gp

entries.name: Feature: False Identity
entries: 你已经创建了第二个身份，包括文件、已建立的熟人和允许你承担该角色的伪装。此外，你可以伪造文件，包括官方文件和个人信件，只要你看过你试图复制的那种文件或笔迹的例子。

entries.name: Favorite Schemes
entries: 每个骗子都有一个他或她优先于其他计划使用的角度。选择一个最喜欢的骗局或在下面的表格中滚动。

rows: 我在机会游戏中作弊。
我剃了钱币或伪造文件。
我潜入人们的生活，利用他们的弱点，确保他们的财富。
我像穿衣服一样穿上新的身份。
我在街头巷尾玩魔术。
我让人们相信，不值钱的垃圾值得他们辛苦挣来的钱。

entries.name: Suggested Characteristics
entries: 骗子是多姿多彩的人物，他们把真实的自我隐藏在他们构建的面具后面。他们反映了人们想要看到的东西，他们想要相信的东西，以及他们如何看待这个世界。但他们的真实自我有时会被不安的良心、老对手或根深蒂固的信任问题所困扰。

rows: 我很容易陷入和失去爱情，而且一直在追求某个人。
我在每个场合都有一个笑话，特别是在不适合幽默的场合。
阿谀奉承是我得到我想要的东西的首选伎俩。
我是一个天生的赌徒，忍不住要为潜在的回报而冒险。
我几乎对所有事情都撒谎，甚至在没有理由的情况下。
讽刺和侮辱是我选择的武器。
我身上有多个神圣的符号，在任何时候都会调用任何可能有用的神灵。
我把我看到的任何可能有一些价值的东西装进口袋。
独立性。我是一个自由的精神--没有人告诉我应该做什么。(混沌)
公平性。我从不针对那些输不起几个硬币的人。(合法的)
慈善。我把我获得的钱分配给真正需要它的人。(好)
创造性。我从来不会把同样的骗局做两次。(混沌)
友谊。物质产品来了又走。友谊的纽带永远持续。(好)
抱负。我决心要做出一番事业。(任何)
我骗了不该骗的人，必须努力确保这个人永远不会与我或我关心的人发生交集。
我把一切都归功于我的导师--一个可能正在某处监狱里腐烂的可怕的人。
在那里的某个地方，我有一个不认识我的孩子。我正在为他或她创造更好的世界。
我来自一个贵族家庭，有一天我会从那些从我这里偷走的人手中夺回我的土地和称号。
一个有权势的人杀了我爱的人。不久的某一天，我将报仇。
我诈骗并毁了一个不值得的人。我试图为我的错误行为赎罪，但可能永远无法原谅自己。
我无法抗拒一张漂亮的脸蛋。
我总是负债累累。我把我的不义之财花在颓废的奢侈品上，比我带来的更快。
我相信，没有人能够像我欺骗别人那样欺骗我。
我太贪婪了，对我自己有利。如果涉及到钱，我就会忍不住去冒险。
我忍不住要诈骗那些比我更强大的人。
我讨厌承认这一点，也会因此而讨厌自己，但如果情况不妙，我就会逃跑，保住自己的皮。

_.special: uniform in the style of your unit and indicative of your rank

_.displayName: horn with which to summon help

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: A uniform in the style of your unit and indicative of your rank, a {@item horn|phb} with which to summon help, a set of {@item manacles|phb}, and a {@item pouch|phb} containing 10 gp

entries.name: Feature: Watcher's Eye
entries: 你在执法和与违法者打交道方面的经验，使你对当地的法律和犯罪分子有了一定的了解。你可以很容易地找到当地的哨所或类似的组织，也可以很容易地找出社区中的犯罪活动窝点，尽管你更有可能在前者而不是后者受到欢迎。

entries.name: Suggested Characteristics
entries: Use the tables for the {@background soldier} background in the Player's Handbook as the basis for your traits and motivations, modifying the entries when appropriate to suit your identity as a member of the city watch.
你的纽带很可能与你的同伴或观察组织本身有关，而且几乎肯定与你的社区有关。你的理想可能涉及促进和平与安全。一个调查员很可能有一个理想，那就是通过成功破案来实现正义。

_.special: maker's mark chisel used to mark your handiwork with the symbol of the clan of crafters you learned your skill from

items.name: Languages:
items.entry: 矮人语或你选择的一种，如果你已经会说矮人语的话

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: A set of {@filter artisan's tools|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=artisan's tools} with which you are proficient, a maker's mark chisel used to mark your handiwork with the symbol of the clan of crafters you learned your skill from, a set of {@item traveler's clothes|phb}, and a {@item pouch|phb} containing 5 gp and a gem worth 10 gp

entries.name: Feature: Respect of the Stout Folk
entries: 尽管宗族手工业者在外人中备受尊敬，但没有人像矮人那样对他们如此推崇。在任何有盾牌矮人或黄金矮人居住的地方，你都有免费的食宿，在这样一个定居点里的人可能会互相争夺，以确定谁能为你（可能还有你的同伴）提供最好的住宿和帮助。

entries.name: Suggested Characteristics
entries: Use the tables for the {@background guild artisan} background in the Player's Handbook as the basis for your traits and motivations, modifying the entries when appropriate to suit your identity as a clan crafter. (For instance, consider the words "guild" and "clan" to be interchangeable.)
你的纽带几乎肯定与教导你的主人或部族有关，否则就是与你的作品有关。你的理想可能与保持你工作的高质量或保存矮人的工艺传统有关。

_.displayName: A set of inconspicuous common clothes

items.name: Skill Proficiencies:
items.entry: {@skill Deception}, plus your choice of {@skill Sleight of Hand} or {@skill Stealth}

items.name: Tool Proficiencies:
items.entry: {@item Disguise Kit|PHB}, {@item forgery kit|PHB}, or {@item thieves' tools|PHB} (one of your choice)

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: A set of inconspicuous {@item common clothes|phb}, a set of {@filter tools|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=artisan's tools} with which you're proficient, and a belt {@item pouch|PHB} containing 10 gp

entries.name: Feature: A Favor in Turn
entries: You have gained enough clout in the {@book Clasp|TDCSR|2|The Clasp} that you can call in a favor from your contacts whenever you're close enough to a center of syndicate activity. A request for a favor can be no longer than 20 words, and is passed up the chain to an undisclosed Spireling for approval. This favor can take on any form subject to the approval of the GM, who decides how it is fulfilled. If muscle is requested, an NPC member of the {@book Clasp|TDCSR|2|The Clasp} can temporarily aid your party. If money is needed, a small loan can be provided. If you've been imprisoned, {@book Clasp|TDCSR|2|The Clasp} operatives can look into breaking you out or paying off the jailer.

At some point, the favor will be called in for repayment, often without warning. Refusing the call will result in your termination—literally. You might be called on to commit a specific burglary, or to pressure an {@book Emonian|TDCSR|3|Emon, the City of Fellowship} dignitary to reveal a secret at an upcoming ball. The {@book Clasp|TDCSR|2|The Clasp} might even demand that you assassinate a specific person, with no questions asked or answered. It's the GM's prerogative to ensure that the syndicate's request is proportionate to the favor they bestowed—or that they compensate you in other ways for a service that goes beyond the scope of repaying the initial favor.

entries.name: Suggested Characteristics
entries: The {@book Clasp|TDCSR|2|The Clasp} enjoys a strange status in Tal'Dorei. The syndicate is a feared group of thieves and killers, whose name is often invoked only in whispers. But at the same time, the organization has a reputation for guerilla heroism, in response to its members having saved countless lives when the {@book Chroma Conclave|TDCSR|1|The Chroma Conclave} attacked {@book Emon|TDCSR|3|Emon, the City of Fellowship}. And so like every {@book Clasp|TDCSR|2|The Clasp} member, your own reputation often swings between these two poles.

Your bond is likely associated with your fellow {@book Clasp|TDCSR|2|The Clasp} members or the individual who introduced you to the syndicate. Your ideal probably involves establishing your importance and indispensability to the {@book Clasp|TDCSR|2|The Clasp}.

entries.caption: Clasp Member Personality Traits
rows: What's life without risk? I'm always willing to take a risk if the reward seems worth it.
I only show my emotions around people I really trust.
I don't need friends; I need allies. When I do make "friends," I only consider what they can do for me.
I look for simple solutions. The world's full of tough problems, but a well-placed knife is a one-size-fits-all answer.
Money talks. I don't. We've got an efficient relationship.
I used to have one rule—don't get involved in other people's problems. Why are things so complicated now?
Crime is a game, and I play to win. I have no sympathy for players who don't get that.
This organization has a lot of folks who cling to ugly, brutal practices. I'm not like that. I'm a professional, and professionals have standards.

entries.caption: Clasp Member Ideals
rows: {@b By Any Means}. I complete jobs. Collateral damage isn't my problem. (Chaotic)
{@b Ambition}. I will climb to the top of the ladder. Everything I do is a stepping-stone to a Spireling's position. (Neutral)
{@b Decisiveness}. It's important to make up your mind so you can act swiftly and without delay. (Neutral)
{@b Honor}. There's room in the {@book Clasp|TDCSR|2|The Clasp} for both good and evil. Every day, I awake and choose to do what's right. (Good)
{@b Family}. The {@book Clasp|TDCSR|2|The Clasp} is family. Anything that's good for the family is good for me. (Lawful)
{@b Self-Interest}. There are too many bleeding hearts in the {@book Clasp|TDCSR|2|The Clasp} these days. Doing the right thing means doing the thing that makes my life better. (Evil)

entries.caption: Clasp Member Bonds
rows: I'd do anything—anything—to protect my comrades.
I'll always be grateful to the Spireling who took me in when I was an orphaned kid.

I was inspired to join the {@book Clasp|TDCSR|2|The Clasp} by the stories my parents told of being saved from the {@book Chroma Conclave's|TDCSR|1|The Chroma Conclave} attack on {@book Emon|TDCSR|3|Emon, the City of Fellowship}. I can look past the organization's flaws.
I was nearly killed by the {@book Myriad|TDCSR|2|The Myriad}. If the {@book Clasp|TDCSR|2|The Clasp} is the enemy of those villains, then the {@book Clasp|TDCSR|2|The Clasp} is my friend.
I've got family back in the old town who are counting on me for money. They don't know how I get it, but they don't need to know.
I joined the {@book Clasp|TDCSR|2|The Clasp} to become rich, powerful, and beloved. That's all there is to it.

entries.caption: Clasp Member Flaws
rows: I'm hopeless at organizing my belongings, and I'm always losing things.
I get bored whenever a plan is going too smoothly. A win is always more fun when it's by the skin of my teeth!
I've seen Spirelings walk out among cheering crowds of thousands. Gods, I wish that were me. I need that to be me.
I'm rubbish with money, and never seem to leave town with a full purse. Keeps me coming back to the life, I suppose.
I can't work with shoddy, makeshift {@item thieves' tools|PHB}. I need everything involving my work to be perfect.
Any slight against me, no matter how small, is cause for revenge.

_.displayName: The scholar's robes of your cloister
borrowed book on the subject of your current study

items.name: Skill Proficiencies:
items.entry: {@skill History}, plus your choice of one from among {@skill Arcana}, {@skill Nature}, and {@skill Religion}

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: The scholar's {@item robes|phb} of your cloister, a writing kit (small {@item pouch|phb} with a quill, ink, folded parchment, and a small penknife), a borrowed {@item book|phb} on the subject of your current study, and a {@item pouch|phb} containing 10 gp

entries.name: Feature: Library Access
entries: 虽然其他人必须经常忍受广泛的采访和大量的费用才能进入你的图书馆，甚至是最普通的档案，但你可以自由而容易地进入图书馆的大部分，尽管它也可能有太有价值的、神奇的或秘密的传说库，允许任何人立即进入。
你对你的回廊的人事和官僚机构有一定的了解，你知道如何在这些关系中游刃有余。
此外，你有可能在整个王国的其他图书馆获得优惠待遇，这是对一个学者同伴的专业礼遇。

entries.name: Suggested Characteristics
entries: Use the tables for the {@background sage} background in the Player's Handbook as the basis for your traits and motivations, modifying the entries when appropriate to suit your identity as a cloistered scholar.
你的纽带几乎肯定与你成长的地方或与你希望通过冒险获得的知识有关。你的理想无疑与你如何看待对知识和真理的追求有关--也许本身就是一个有价值的目标，也可能是达到理想目的的一种手段。

_.special: cape in the colours of your house

items.name: Skill Proficiencies:
items.entry: Two of the following: {@skill Persuasion}, {@skill Athletics}, {@skill History}, or {@skill Intimidation}

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: A {@item signet ring|PHB} or brooch bearing your family crest, a cape in the colours of your house, a set of {@item fine clothes|PHB}, and a {@item pouch|PHB} containing 25 gp

rows: I was well celebrated in my city as a slayer of a great troll.
I witnessed the death of my family during the civil war. They were targets for their ties to the von Kessel name.
I led my knights to victory in defending our castle during a raid in the war.
I lost a lot of good soldiers in an earlier expedition into Drakkenheim. We never made it past the gate.
My house was an enemy of the von Kessel family and had many battles with them.
I broke ties with my family when they folded to the Silver Order.
I am related, not to a king or queen, but to a noble figure who sat in the small council and made important decisions for their represented house.
My family lost everything in the destruction of Drakkenheim. We are noble only in name, no longer in standing.

entries.name: Feature: Noble Confidence
entries: During a short rest you can give an inspiring pep talk to a number of allies equal to your proficiency bonus. Once in the next 8 hours, each of those allies can roll {@dice 1d4} and add it to the result of a single attack roll, ability check, or saving throw.

entries.caption: Suggested Characteristics
rows: I consider myself a renowned monster slayer, and like to remind everyone of the many accomplishments I hold to my name.
I keep family traditions close. Honour and family are amongst the most important things in the world, and I cherish them.
I miss the comforts of my home. This city is dirty and smells terrible.
I believe in the good in people, and I hope to find a peaceful resolution to our problems. A diplomatic approach is something Westemär greatly needs.
As a noble, I have a responsibility to protect those who cannot protect themselves.
It is highly important that I look my best and maintain my regal demeanor in all situations. My reputation must go untarnished.
I may be of noble birth, but have lived life on the road for some time. I am more than willing to share what I have with others, as I am no better or worse than anyone else.
There is no challenge I can't face. I heard about the horrors and monsters of this world, and I am what they fear the most.
Respect. I am a respected member of my family, and I expect what remains of Drakkenheim's nobility and royal line to acknowledge my standing. (Lawful)
Responsibility. It is my responsibility as a representative of my noble line to remain cordial, and diplomatic in dealings with the various high ranking members of Drakkenheim's society. (Good)
Privacy. I do not wish for my nobility to come up. It may be best if the people of Drakkenheim do not know who I am. At least for now. (Any)
Duty. It is my duty to aid the people of Drakkenheim. As a noble I was connected to this city, and it is what is expected of me. (Good)
Glory. I must claim my victories and prove myself in battle. (Any)
Family. Blood is thicker than water and I will fight to defend my family's honour. (Good)
I must prove myself as a great warrior for my house and my people.
My family was once bound to the royal family of Westemär, I must ensure we remain bound to whoever takes the throne.
My family's fortune was lost. Drakkenheim may be our last chance to get it back.
My family was betrayed by one of the royal houses, and I plan to make sure any that remain of that name are brought to justice and my family takes its place where it belongs.
I am destined to rule, as my ancestors before me have.
I have been sent unwillingly on a diplomatic mission to Drakkenheim. I am to gain political standing in these crumbling ruins.
I boast about my own triumphs, and belittle the accomplishments of others.
Bound by honor, I can never back down from a challenge, nor can I let those who undervalue my name go unchallenged.
I do not like getting my hands dirty. Other people must do the heavy lifting, not me.
I like to flaunt my wealth, and I spare no expense.
I'm never wrong. Even if I was, I would never admit it.
I was forced to lead, but I am very far out of my depth and desperately hoping people do not catch on that I don't know what I am doing here.

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: A {@item two-person tent|phb}, {@filter artisan's tools|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=artisan's tools}, a {@item holy symbol|phb}, a set of {@item traveler's clothes|phb}, a belt {@item pouch|phb} containing 5 gp

entries.name: Lifestyle
entries: Poor

entries.name: Overview
entries: 你是数以百计的难民之一，他们被赶出希尔斯法尔，或逃离神话德兰诺的毁灭，现在躲在科曼托森林北部屋檐下的隐藏营地。如果你是在营地里长大的，那么你就从来没有去过精灵之树村以外的定居点。作为精灵的客人，你已经学会了他们的方式和森林的方式。你也是一个受创伤的人，因为残余的野性魔法、图尔坦纳在神话德兰诺沦陷时释放的能量，以及对突袭的持续恐惧，在希尔斯法尔的竞技场上猎取非人类的战斗，对你产生了影响，就像对营地里的每个人一样。

entries.name: Feature: Shelter of the Elven Clergy
entries: The clerics of Elventree have vowed to care for the Cormanthor refugees. They will help you when they can, including providing you and your companions with free healing and care at temples, shrines, and other established presences in Elventree. They will also provide you (but only you) with a poor lifestyle. Note: This feature is a variant of the Acolyte feature.

rows: 我渴望一个从未真正存在过的家，无论是在难民营、希尔斯法尔，还是神话德兰诺。
虽然我不是精灵，但我是一个狂热的、激进的精灵诸神崇拜者。
我活在当下，知道我的生活随时可能被颠覆。
我欣赏所有形式的美。
我憎恨黑暗精灵和尼瑟斯人，因为他们过去各自把精灵赶出了科曼瑟尔。
我是一个在森林中的帐篷里长大的森林土包子，对城市生活完全无知。
我是与许多其他种族的孩子一起长大的。我完全没有种族偏见。
精灵们对许多无法用其他语言表达的事情都有恰如其分的说法。我在讲话中加入了精灵族的词汇、短语和谚语。
病人。精灵们教会了我如何从长远角度考虑和规划。(合法)
叛逆的。政府和政治家把我的家人赶到了集中营。只要我认为可以逃脱，我就会巧妙地违抗权威。(混沌)
自我 - 吸收。我不得不注意第一号，这么久以来，这已经成为第二天性。(任何)
漫游癖。我想尽可能多地看到难民营以外的世界。(任意)
慷慨。我尽我所能帮助那些需要帮助的人，无论他们是谁。(好)
和他们一起去深渊。希尔斯法尔的人把我赶了出来。我不会冒险去帮助他们。(邪恶)
在我无处可去的时候，精灵们接纳了我。作为回报，我尽我所能地帮助有需要的精灵们。
我寻求对希尔斯法尔的人进行报复，因为他们把我的家人赶进了森林。
我的家人在被赶出希尔斯法尔时失去了一切。我努力重建这笔财富。
森林为我提供了食物和住所。作为回报，我保护森林和居住在其中的人。
我深深地、悲惨地爱上了一个种族寿命远比我长或短的人。
我的大家庭成员没有进入难民营，或者被绑架到竞技场作战。我不知疲倦地寻找他们。
我在室内和地下非常不自在。
我是傲慢的。我在精灵族中长大，并模仿他们。相比之下，其他种族就显得很粗糙了。
精灵这个，精灵那个。我对精灵们感到厌烦。
我是一个守财奴。由于以前曾经失去过一切，我把我的财产和财富攥得很紧。
我是一个索取者。我太习惯于别人为我提供服务，以至于我已经开始期待每个人都能这样做。
我相信诸神已经诅咒了我，我的家人，以及所有的科曼托难民。我们都是注定的，注定的，我告诉你!

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: A set of {@item fine clothes|phb} and a {@item pouch|phb} containing 5 gp

entries.name: Feature: Court Functionary
entries: 你对官僚机构如何运作的了解，使你能够接触到任何你遇到的贵族法庭或政府的记录和内部运作。你知道谁是推动者，谁是你所寻求的恩惠，以及该团体中目前的阴谋是什么。

entries.name: Suggested Characteristics
entries: Use the tables for the {@background guild artisan} background in the Player's Handbook as the basis for your traits and motivations, modifying the entries when appropriate to suit your identity as a courtier.
你起家的贵族宫廷或官僚组织与你的纽带有直接或间接的联系（可能涉及到团体中的某些人，如你的赞助人或导师）。你的理想可能与你的宫廷或组织的主流哲学有关。

_.displayName: dark common clothes including a hood

items.name: Tool Proficiencies:
items.entry: One type of {@filter gaming set|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=gaming set}, {@item thieves' tools|phb}

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: A {@item crowbar|phb}, a set of dark {@item common clothes|phb} including a hood, and a belt {@item pouch|phb} containing 15 gp

entries.name: Feature: Criminal Contact
entries: 你有一个可靠和值得信赖的联系人，他是你与其他罪犯网络的联络人。你知道如何从你的联系人那里获得信息，即使是在很远的地方；具体来说，你知道当地的信使、腐败的商队老板和肮脏的水手，他们可以为你传递信息。

entries.name: Specialty
entries: 罪犯有很多种，在盗贼公会或类似的犯罪组织中，个别成员有特殊的专长。即使是在这种组织之外活动的罪犯也对某些类型的犯罪有强烈的偏好。选择你在犯罪生涯中扮演的角色，或者在下面的表格中滚动。

rows: 敲诈者
盗贼
执法者
栅栏
公路抢劫犯
雇佣杀手
扒手
走私者

entries.name: Suggested Characteristics
entries: 犯罪分子表面上可能看起来像恶棍，而且他们中的许多人都是恶棍中的恶棍。但有些人有丰富的可爱的，甚至是可救赎的特征。盗贼中可能有荣誉，但罪犯很少表现出对法律或权威的尊重。

rows: 我总是有一个计划，当事情出错时。
无论在什么情况下，我都很冷静。我从不提高嗓门或让情绪控制我。
在一个新地方，我做的第一件事就是记下所有有价值的东西的位置，或者可能藏有这种东西的地方。
我宁愿交一个新朋友，也不愿交一个新敌人。
我对信任的态度非常缓慢。那些看起来最公平的人往往有最多的隐藏。
我不注意某种情况下的风险。从不告诉我几率。
让我做一件事的最好方法是告诉我我不能做。
我一听到最轻微的侮辱就会爆炸。
荣誉。我不在交易中偷窃他人的东西。(合法的)
自由。枷锁是要被打破的，那些要铸造枷锁的人也是一样。(混沌)
慈善。我从富人那里偷东西，这样我就可以帮助有需要的人。(好)
贪婪。我将不惜一切代价成为富人。(邪恶)
人。我忠于我的朋友，不忠于任何理想，其他所有人都可以去冥河旅行，我只在乎。(中立)
救赎。每个人身上都有善的火花。(好)
我正在努力偿还我欠一位慷慨的恩人的旧债。
我的不义之财用于支持我的家庭。
一些重要的东西被夺走了，而我的目标是把它偷回来。
我将成为有史以来最伟大的盗贼。
我犯了一个可怕的罪行。我希望我可以为它赎罪。
我所爱的人因为我犯的一个错误而死亡。这种情况不会再发生了。
当我看到有价值的东西时，我什么都想不起来，只想着如何去偷它。
当面临金钱和朋友之间的选择时，我通常选择金钱。
如果有计划，我就会忘记它。如果我不忘记它，我就会忽略它。
我有一个 "告诉"，当我说谎的时候就会被发现。
当事情看起来不妙时，我就掉头逃跑。
一个无辜的人因为我犯下的罪行而被关进监狱。我对此没有意见。

background.name: Custom Background

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: The equipment package from any background

entries.name: Feature: Choose a Feature
entries: Choose a feature from any background.

entries.name: Suggested Characteristics
entries: Use the suggested characteristics from any background.
{@note See the section on {@book Customizing a Background|PHB|4|Customizing a Background} in the {@book Player's Handbook|PHB} for more information.}

_.special: small chip of delerium encased in glass

_.displayName: amulet with a symbol of your chosen god

items.name: Skill Proficiencies:
items.entry: Two of the following: {@skill History}, {@skill Religion}, {@skill Arcana}, {@skill Nature}

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: A set of pale {@item robes|PHB}, a small chip of delerium encased in glass, a walking stick, an {@item amulet|PHB} with a symbol of your chosen god, a small {@item book|PHB} of religious text

rows: I was on a quest of self-enlightenment.
I ritualistically surround myself with lit candles and ancient texts when I rest.
I had taken a vow of silence until the time that my voice was needed to fulfil my destiny.
I was the caretaker of ancient relics of our faith and am quested with finding others.
I am but a pilgrim hoping to find divine light in dark places in the world.
I was guided to my faith by angels who rescued me from my dark past.
I broke my vows to my faith and was exiled. I seek redemption.
I must prove myself worthy to my faith and its purpose, no matter the amount of blood spilled or lives lost.

entries.name: Feature: Guided by Faith
entries: A number of times per day equal to your proficiency bonus, you may ask the Game Master to reveal the DC of any ability check you make before rolling the dice. You may then decide whether or not you wish to attempt the roll.

entries.caption: Suggested Characteristics
rows: I empathize with those who do not follow the path of light. Creatures of all types can be brought back to the path of righteousness and are often suffering and in great pain.
I believe in the words of my religion and quote its texts and scriptures as often as I can.
我容忍（或不容忍）其他信仰，尊重（或谴责）对其他神灵的崇拜。
I have spent my life in a temple or church. Rough living wears on me quickly.
I believe very strongly that everything will turn out okay, and nothing can shake my positive attitude.
My faith kept me distant from others. I have very little experience with the world outside the church/temple/shrine.
I have extremely strict etiquette and manners for interactions and tasks, and I refuse to stray from them.
I am working on my thesis of religious ongoings in the world and excitedly discuss the nuances of these ideas with anyone and everyone.
Logic. Emotions must not cloud our judgement on what is right or true. (Lawful)
Self. My religious journey is that of discovering myself. If I can obtain that, there is nothing left to know. (Any)
Charity. I will always help those in need, no matter the cost. (Good)
Faith. The path laid out before me is determined by the divine entity I worship. I will follow its signs and patterns to fulfil my purpose. (Lawful)

Power. The gods have granted me divine powers and I must use them to make those who do not worship as strongly as I see the divine light and understand that I am the one true speaker of my faith. (Chaotic)
Peace. I do not like to be part of conflicts, rather a neutral voice of reason to all sides. (Neutral)
Nothing is more important than my church and what it represents.
I joined my religion to hide from a past I would rather forget.
The path to enlightenment is unending. I must stay the course.
I will die if it means doing right by my religious beliefs.
Everything I do is for the good of the common people.
I seek to preserve the ancient texts and artefact of my religion.
I judge others harshly and believe my path to be the one true path.
I believe in the words of my religion so strongly that I follow them without question.
The goal I have set for myself is my destiny, and I can not act against it or abandon it for any reason.
My religion was meant to keep the dark thoughts at bay, but I find myself losing that battle and a blood thirst grows within me.
This is my first taste of life outside my religion, and I enjoy its pleasures a little too much.

The gods and my faith have determined that I am always correct as I speak on their behalf. There is no question in my mind that I speak the ultimate truths and any who do not agree are misguided fools.

_.special: the starting equipment of the background described in this chapter for your secondary guild

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: A Dimir insignia, three small knives, a set of dark-colored {@item common clothes|phb}, and the starting equipment of the background described in this chapter for your secondary guild

entries.name: Feature: False Identity
entries: 你有不止一个身份。你大部分时间所佩戴的那个身份使你看起来是迪米尔家族以外的一个公会的成员。你有文件，有既定的熟人，还有伪装，使你能够扮演那个角色，并融入第二行会。
无论什么时候，你都可以放弃这个身份，融入城市中无拘无束的人群中。
Consider why you're embedded in the secondary guild. Create a story with your DM, inspired by rolling on the following table or choosing a reason that suits you.

rows: 我的父母属于这个行会，我让他们认为我在追随他们的脚步。
我被派来跟踪这个公会的活动。
我被指派去接近这个行会的一个人，了解他们的秘密。
我被指派从这个公会的队伍中招募一名新的迪米尔间谍。
在迪米尔人招募我之前，我是这个行会的成员。
我不喜欢这个行会所代表的东西，想从内部摧毁它。
我暗自希望能离开迪米尔，加入这个行会，但迪米尔是逃不掉的。
我选择这个公会是随机的，或者说是出于好奇。

entries.name: Dimir Guild Spells
entries: {@i Prerequisite: Spellcasting or Pact Magic class feature}
对你来说，迪米尔公会法术表上的法术被添加到你的法术等级的法术列表中。(如果你是一个拥有多个法术列表的多类角色，这些法术将被添加到所有的列表中）。

entries.caption: Dimir Guild Spells
rows: 坎特里普
{@spell encode thoughts|GGR}, {@spell mage hand}
1st
{@spell disguise self}, {@spell sleep}
2nd
{@spell detect thoughts}, {@spell pass without trace}
3rd
{@spell gaseous form}, {@spell meld into stone}, {@spell nondetection}
4th
{@spell arcane eye}, {@spell freedom of movement}
5th
{@spell modify memory}

entries: Your magic is meant to be subtle and undetectable, but it might pull shadows or clouds of mist around you as you cast your spells. Using the {@spell encode thoughts|GGR} cantrip described below, you can turn a creature's thoughts (including your own) into a thought strand that others can potentially read, share, or steal. These thought strands are treated as valuable currency among the Dimir.

entries.name: Suggested Characteristics
entries: 擅长渗透、伪装和欺骗，迪米尔家族的成员看起来难以捉摸。你的真实个性和理想可能永远不会显现出来，或者它们可能将你标记为二级公会的一个古怪成员。

entries.caption: Personality Traits
rows: 我很善于隐藏自己的真实想法和感受。
当我对透露某些东西有疑问时，我就认为这是一个秘密，而且我不会分享它。
我喜欢听起来很神秘，因为隐藏的智慧会随着时间的推移而变得更加深刻。
我对那些妨碍我的人没有耐心。
我喜欢听别人的恶梦。
战斗的目的是快速、干净和单方面的。
我喜欢坚守在阴影中。
我从不显示我的愤怒。我只是策划我的报复。

entries.caption: Ideals
rows: {@b Guild}. My true guild is all that really matters. (Any)
{@b Control}. I like pulling the strings. (Lawful)
{@b Secrets}. I collect secrets and never reveal them. (Any)
{@b Knowledge}. I want to know as much as I can about this city and how it works. (Any)
{@b Independence}. I value the freedom to pursue my own goals without interference. (Chaotic)
{@b Nihilism}. I don't believe in anything, and anyone who does is a fool. (Neutral)

entries.caption: Bonds
rows: 我发现了一个我不能让别人发现的秘密--包括我的公会上级。
我与我所潜入的行会中的某人形成了亲密的友谊或恋情。
招募我的迪米尔特工被揭开面具并被杀害。我对凶手的报复将是彻底而痛苦的。
我在伊斯梅里图书馆花了尽可能多的时间，因为我确信在它的外表下有一个信息枢纽在运作。我想知道它的秘密!
我对我在公会中的上级完全忠诚，比对公会或其公会会长更忠诚。
有人发现了我的真实身份。

entries.caption: Flaws
rows: 我非常喜欢秘密，甚至不愿意与需要知道的人分享计划的细节。
我宁愿让我的朋友们死去，也不愿意暴露我的真实身份。
除了自己，我很难相信任何人。
我有一个特别的恶习，如果我不小心，就会使我所有的秘密处于危险之中。
我很确定我做过一些可怕的事情，但因为公会的心灵魔法，我记不起来了。
我太信任那些给我下命令的人了。

entries.name: Contacts
entries: 作为卧底工作的迪米尔家族的特工，你在你的行会中的联系有限。在假身份的掩护下，你在二级行会内的关系通常更为广泛。
在迪米尔联系人表上掷一次，给你一个盟友作为你在迪米尔的联系人。然后在你的第二行会的表格上掷两次。第一次滚动给你一个盟友，第二次滚动给你一个对手。

entries.caption: Dimir Contacts
rows: 我认识一个迪米尔信使，他从更高的指挥系统中向我转达信息。
我从一个变形人那里得到命令，我只通过我们交换的一系列代码短语来识别。
一个炫富的吸血鬼是我的秘密公会上司，通过密码信息把我召唤到一个豪华的庄园。
我从未见过我的公会联系人，但我收到心灵感应的信息，通常在梦中。
我从未见过我的公会联系人，但我从街灯和涂鸦的图案中得到了编码信息。
直到我们开始了浪漫的关系之后，我才发现我的公会联系人的身份。
我的上司保持着一个精心设计的身份，即一个年轻的街头顽童......除非这一切都是谎言，我被一个扭曲的孩子派去执行可笑的任务。
我和我的兄弟姐妹都从一个神秘的联系人那里得到心灵感应的命令，我开始怀疑我兄弟姐妹的命令的真实性。

entries.name: How Do I Fit In?
entries: 作为一个迪米尔冒险家，你是公会网络中的一员，由间谍、小偷、刺客和心灵法师组成，潜伏在公众公会的门面后面。表面上，迪米尔家族呈现出一个由信使、调查员、媒体记者和档案员组成的网络，处理信息和传播新闻。但你和你的同行们在秘密中交易。你使用秘密符号、符文和信号与其他迪米尔特工偷偷沟通，经常在众目睽睽之下。

Like any good spy, you have multiple identities: your true face as an agent of House Dimir; a guildless identity; and a role as a member of another guild. Within that secondary guild, you might already be on a mission for House Dimir, assigned to spy on the guild, collect information about a person, or recruit another spy from the ranks of the guild. Or that guild could be a launching point for your real mission.
