items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: A Simic insignia, a set of {@item common clothes|phb|commoner's clothes}, a {@item book|phb} of research notes, an {@item ink pen|phb}, a {@item Ink (1-ounce bottle)|phb|bottle of squid ink}, a {@item oil (flask)|phb|flask of oil} (made from blubber), a {@item acid (vial)|phb|vial of acid} (derived from digestive juices), a vial of fish scales, a vial of seaweed, a vial of jellyfish stingers, a glass bottle of unidentified slime, and a belt {@item pouch|phb} containing 10 gp (Azorius 1-zino coins)

entries.name: Clades and Projects
entries: As a Simic researcher, you are part of a clade—a diverse group of individuals combining disparate talents in pursuit of a common goal—or a researcher on a specialized, short-term project focused on addressing an immediate need. You can roll a {@dice d6} or choose from the options in the Research Options table to determine your area of research.

entries.caption: Research Options
rows: 船体克拉德，专注于保护和耐久性
翅族，专注于运动
Gyre Clade, focused on cyclical patterns and metamagic
守护者项目，专注于创造警卫怪物和超级士兵
Crypsis Project, focused on intelligence and counterintelligence
在一个新领域的独立研究

entries.name: Feature: Researcher
entries: 当你试图学习或回忆一个魔法或科学事实时，如果你不知道这些信息，你知道你可以从哪里和谁那里获得它。通常，这些信息来自西米克实验室，有时也来自伊兹特设施、图书馆、大学、独立的学者或其他有学识的人或生物。知道在哪里可以找到信息并不能自动使你学会它；你可能需要提供贿赂、恩惠或其他激励措施来诱使人们透露他们的秘密。
你的管理员可能会规定，你所寻找的知识被藏在一个无法进入的地方，或者根本无法找到。发掘多元宇宙最深层的秘密可能需要一次冒险，甚至是整个战役。

entries.name: Simic Guild Spells
entries: {@i Prerequisite: Spellcasting or Pact Magic class feature}
对你来说，西米克公会法术表上的法术被添加到你的法术等级的法术列表中。(如果你是一个拥有多个法术列表的多类角色，这些法术会被添加到所有的列表中）。

entries.caption: Simic Guild Spells
rows: 坎特里普
{@spell acid splash}, {@spell druidcraft}
1st
{@spell detect poison and disease}, {@spell expeditious retreat}, {@spell jump}
2nd
{@spell alter self}, {@spell enhance ability}, {@spell enlarge/reduce}
3rd
{@spell gaseous form}, {@spell water breathing}, {@spell wind wall}
4th
{@spell freedom of movement}, {@spell polymorph}
5th
{@spell creation}

entries: 当你的魔法使你自己或他人的身体发生改变时，其结果往往显示出鱼、两栖动物或其他水栖生物的特征。蓝绿色的魔法能量漩涡有时会伴随着你的施法，形成螺旋状，反映出大自然的数学完美性。

entries.name: Suggested Characteristics
entries: 西米克联合体的怪异科学吸引了某种类型的个性，并包含了一套关于生命本质的信念。西米克成员的纽带和缺陷来自于他们的科学研究--包括他们创造的新的生命形式，他们可能会变得非常依恋。

entries.caption: Personality Traits
rows: 我迫不及待地想看看我接下来会变成什么样子！"。
我相信，一切都倾向于不断改进。
我急于向任何表现出最小兴趣的人解释我最复杂的实验和理论的每个细节。
我认为，每个人都需要向他们解释哪怕是最基本的概念。
我描述所发生的一切，就好像它要进入我的研究笔记一样（而且往往是这样）。
我对生命的看似无限的形式和适应性充满了好奇。
我忍不住要窥探任何被禁止的东西，因为它一定是非常有趣的。
我采用高度技术性的词汇，以避免沟通中的不精确和含糊。

entries.caption: Ideals
rows: {@b Guild}. My guild is all that really matters. (Any)
{@b Change}. All life is meant to progress toward perfection, and our work is to hurry it along—no matter what must be upended along the way. (Chaotic)
{@b Knowledge}. Understanding the world is more important than what you do with your knowledge. (Neutral)
{@b Greater Good}. I want to reshape the world into higher forms of life so that all can enjoy evolution. (Good)
{@b Logic}. It's foolish to let emotions and principles interfere with the conclusions of logic. (Lawful)
{@b Superiority}. My vast intellect and strength are directed toward increasing my sway over others. (Evil)

entries.caption: Bonds
rows: 我帮助创造了一个克拉西，我像爱护宠物一样爱它，并愿意带着它去任何地方......除了它有一栋楼那么大，而且它可能会吃掉我。
在我的实验室里，我发现了一种东西，我认为它可以消除拉夫尼卡的一半生命。
我的支系中的其他研究人员是我的家人--一个古怪的大家族，包括许多物种的成员和部分。
我做研究的实验室包含了对我来说很珍贵的一切。
我将报复那个短视的傻瓜，他杀死了我宝贵的克拉希斯创作。
我做的每件事都是为了给我爱的人留下深刻印象。

entries.caption: Flaws
rows: 我有一个相当尴尬的突变，我尽我所能保持隐蔽。
比起打怪兽，我更有兴趣做怪兽解剖学的笔记。
我所处的每一个社交场合似乎都会导致我提出无礼的个人问题。
我对自己适应任何情况和处理任何危险的能力有极大的信心。
我愿意承担任何风险，以赢得对我的科学才华的认可。
我在研究和任何其他必须完成的任务中都有走捷径的倾向。

entries.name: Contacts
entries: 氏族的流动性质，其名册跨越不同的实验室，并随着研究人员发现新的兴趣而变化，在西米克人中创造了丰富的联系。公会成员生活在被称为 "分区 "的水槽中，他们的隔离使他们不与外人接触。然而，相当数量的西米克成员是其他公会的前成员。
Roll twice on the Simic Contacts table (for an ally and a rival) and once on the Non-Simic Contacts table.

entries.caption: Simic Contacts
rows: 我的研究以我父母的工作为基础，并将其推向有趣的新方向。
如果一个严重的问题让我困惑，我可以指望我的导师提供清晰的思路。
实验室的一位前同事后来在守护者项目上工作。
一位前同事涉足了可能不道德、几乎肯定是非法的研究领域。
昔日的情人现在是一个突出的宗族的监督者。
我的兄弟姐妹已经成为一个几乎无法辨认的变种人。
一个老朋友退居二线，过起了苦行僧的隐居生活，致力于思考哲学原理。
我以前的族长现在正从事实地研究，研究拉夫尼卡上一些最大的野兽和怪物。

entries.caption: Non-Simic Contacts
rows: 我的哥哥姐姐对我没有跟随他们进入阿佐里乌斯而感到不安。
一名博罗军士总是在问关于我工作的问题，但我怀疑他们是真正的好奇。
我族中的一个朋友认为我不知道他们是迪米尔的特工。
我帮助一个戈尔加里孢子德鲁伊为他们的真菌田施肥和生长。
我无法理解是什么让我的童年朋友跑去加入格鲁尔。
我喜欢和我在伊兹特的朋友比较，尽管我们的研究领域非常不同。
我从一个奥尔乔夫集团的人那里借了很多钱，以帮助资助我的研究。
A Rakdos ringmaster has taken an interest in my research which, come to think of it, might make a nice sideshow act.
当我加入西米克时，我留下了塞勒斯尼亚和一个爱人。
掷出一个额外的西米克联系人；你可以决定这个联系人是盟友还是对手。

entries.name: How Do I Fit In?
entries: 作为一名西米克冒险家，你的任务很可能与适应主义哲学相一致；公会之间的分歧和紧张关系很快就会爆发成公开的冲突，而你的公会需要你的帮助来确保西米克的生存。这种帮助的形式可能是抵御戈尔加里人对西米克分区的入侵，或者保护西米克的研究不受阿佐里乌斯的侵扰。它也可能涉及更微妙的外交工作，以维持公会之间的平衡，或旨在破坏另一个公会的权力掠夺的潜规则。
自我完善也是你任务的一个重要部分。任何你能使自己更有能力的事情--无论是学习一个新的法术还是采用一个新的杂交变异--都会给西米克的武器库带来更强大的武器。联合体必须改变才能生存，这意味着公会的个人成员也必须成长和适应。

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: A fancy leather vest or a pair of leather boots, a set of {@item common clothes|phb}, and a leather {@item pouch|phb} with 15 gp

entries.name: Feature: Down Low
entries: You are acquainted with a network of smugglers who are willing to help you out of tight situations. While in a particular town, city, or other similarly sized community (DM's discretion), you and your companions can stay for free in safe houses. Safe houses provide a poor lifestyle. While staying at a safe house, you can choose to keep your presence (and that of your companions) a secret.

entries.name: Claim to Fame
entries: 每个走私者都有一个使他们有别于普通罪犯的故事。靠着智慧、航海技术或银色的舌头，你活到了现在，并经常讲述这个故事。你可以在下面的表格中滚动来决定你的主张，或者选择一个最适合你角色的主张。

rows: 鲸鱼的精神。你把偷来的矮人烈酒装在一条死鲸鱼的身体里走私，这条鲸鱼被拉到渔船后面。当你交付货物时，尸体突然爆炸，鲸鱼肉和威士忌酒瓶被送到半英里外。
车和剑。你驾驶着一辆装满被盗艺术品的马车穿过战场中央，同时唱着海上的棚歌来迷惑战斗人员。
新兵。你在另一个国家的海军入伍，目的是将偷来的珠宝走私到一个遥远的港口。在从海军中消失并来到这里之前，你获得了一个小级别。
阴影之河。你的河船不小心穿过了面纱，进入了阴影之城几个小时。在那里的时候，你卖掉了一些被盗的龙裔神器，然后回到这个位面，划船回家。
金色的心。你同意运送一个逃离战争的家庭。孩子在检查站开始哭闹，你把你所有的金子给了守卫，让你通过。那家人从未发现你的这一举动。
扮演两边的角色。有一次，你同时走私了一箱箱的弩箭和一捆捆的箭，每一捆都是要送给地区战争中的敌对一方的。买家在同一时间到达，但并没有发现你的诡计。

entries.name: Suggested Characteristics
entries: 一般来说，走私者重视生存，然后是利润，高于其他事情。他们可能是一个更大的组织的一部分，也可能自己经营一艘小型走私船。走私者活在他们说过的谎言中，他们有一种天生的能力，可以回忆起他们曾经说过的所有假话和半真半假的话。

entries.caption: Smuggler Personality Traits
rows: 我喜欢在水上活动，但讨厌钓鱼。
我认为一切都以货币价值为标准。
我从未停止过微笑。
没有什么能让我感到不安；我有一个适合各种场合的谎言。
我喜欢黄金，但不会欺骗朋友。
我喜欢做别人认为不可能的事情。
当我看到太阳从海面上升起时，我变得踌躇满志。
我不是普通的罪犯；我是一个主谋。

entries.caption: Smuggler Ideals
rows: {@b Wealth} Heaps of coins in a secure vault is all I dream of. (Any)
{@b Smuggler's Code} I uphold the unwritten rules of the smugglers, who do not cheat one another or directly harm innocents. (Lawful)
{@b All for a Coin} I'll do nearly anything if it means I turn a profit. (Evil)
{@b Peace and Prosperity} I smuggle only to achieve a greater goal that benefits my community. (Good)
{@b People} For all my many lies, I place a high value on friendship. (Any)
{@b Daring} I am most happy when risking everything. (Any)

entries.caption: Smuggler Bonds
rows: 我的容器被偷走了，我燃烧着找回它的欲望。
我打算成为我所属的走私者网络的领导人。
我欠下的债务是无法用黄金偿还的。
在做完最后一份工作后，我将从企业退休。
我被一个走私者同伴欺骗了，他从我这里偷走了一些珍贵的东西。我将找到那个小偷。
我把大部分利润捐给慈善事业，而且我不喜欢吹嘘。

entries.caption: Smuggler Flaws
rows: 撒谎是反射性的，我有时会在不知不觉中参与其中。
我倾向于从利润和损失的角度来评估我的关系。
我相信每个人都有代价，并对那些以美德自居的人冷嘲热讽。
我很难相信别人的话。
很少有人知道真正的我。
虽然我表现得很有魅力，但我对别人毫无感觉，不知道什么是友谊。

_.special: trophy taken from a fallen enemy (a dagger, broken blade, or piece of a banner)

items.name: Tool Proficiencies:
items.entry: One type of {@filter gaming set|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=gaming set}, {@filter vehicles (land)|items|source=phb;dmg|miscellaneous=mundane|type=vehicle (land)}

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: An insignia of rank, a trophy taken from a fallen enemy (a {@item dagger|phb}, broken blade, or piece of a banner), a bone {@item dice set|phb} or {@item playing card set|phb}, a set of {@item common clothes|phb}, and a belt {@item pouch|phb} containing 10 gp

entries.name: Feature: Military Rank
entries: 你在当兵的时候有一个军衔。忠于你以前的军事组织的士兵仍然承认你的权威和影响力，如果他们的军衔较低，他们会听从你。你可以引用你的军衔来对其他士兵施加影响，并征用简单的装备或马匹供临时使用。你通常还可以进入你的军衔被承认的友军营地和要塞。

entries.name: Specialty
entries: During your time as a soldier, you had a specific role to play in your unit or army. Roll a d8 or choose from the options in the table below to determine your role:

rows: 官员
侦察员
步兵
骑兵队
治疗师
军需官
标准制定者
辅助人员（厨师、铁匠或类似人员）。

entries.name: Suggested Characteristics
entries: 战争的恐怖与严格的兵役纪律相结合，在所有士兵身上留下了印记，塑造了他们的理想，建立了牢固的纽带，并经常使他们留下伤痕，容易受到恐惧、羞耻和仇恨的影响。

rows: 我总是很有礼貌，很尊重人。
我被战争的记忆所困扰。我无法将暴力的图像从我的脑海中抹去。
我失去了太多的朋友，而我却迟迟不能结交新的朋友。
我的军事经验中充满了与几乎所有战斗情况相关的鼓舞人心和警示性的故事。
我可以盯着一只地狱猎犬而不退缩。
我喜欢坚强，喜欢打碎东西。
我有一种粗俗的幽默感。
我直面问题。简单、直接的解决方案是通往成功的最佳途径。
更大的利益。我们的命运是为保护他人而舍弃自己的生命。(善)
责任。我做我必须做的事，服从公正的权威。(合法的)
独立性。当人们盲目地听从命令时，就会拥护一种暴政。(混沌)
权力。在生活中和战争中，更强大的力量获胜。(邪恶)
活着，让生活。理想不值得为之杀人或开战。(中立)
国家。我的城市、国家、或人民都是重要的。(任何)
我仍然愿意为和我一起服务的人牺牲自己的生命。
有人在战场上救了我的命。时至今日，我永远不会丢下一个朋友。
我的荣誉就是我的生命。
我永远不会忘记我的公司遭受的惨败，也不会忘记对付它的敌人。
在我身边战斗的人是值得为之牺牲的人。
我为那些不能为自己战斗的人而战。
我们在战斗中面临的滔天大敌仍然让我恐惧得发抖。
我对任何不是经过验证的战士的人都不太尊重。
我在战斗中犯了一个可怕的错误，导致许多人丧生--我将不惜一切代价为这个错误保守秘密。
我对我的敌人的仇恨是盲目的和不合理的。
我遵守法律，即使法律造成了痛苦。
我宁愿吃我的盔甲也不承认我的错误。

_.displayName: trinket from the life you stayed behind to defend

items.name: Tool Proficiencies:
items.entry: One type of {@filter gaming set|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=gaming set}, thieves' tools

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: A small knife, a set of {@item common clothes|phb}, a {@item trinket|phb} from the life you stayed behind to defend, a belt {@item pouch|phb} with 10 gp

entries.name: Lifestyle
entries: Poor

entries.name: Overview
entries: "我们需要离开，现在！" 这些话仍然在晚上困扰着你的梦。当所有人都在逃离弗兰的时候，你选择了留下。不管是出于情感上的依恋，还是对财富的追求，你做出的决定将影响你的余生。

没有关系的人，食物变得越来越少。你成了一个乞丐，为了活命，你向任何有食物或黄金的感兴趣的人交换信息。你很擅长你的工作，并认为你是不可战胜的。当你被 "病毒之泪 "俘虏时，这一切都改变了。"病毒之泪 "是瓦冈沙拉克斯的士兵，也就是被打倒的 "病毒"，因为你向那些一心想推翻龙的人出售秘密。他们把你关在斯托扬诺门的牢房里。最初的几个星期，你希望能活下来。当几周变成几个月，审讯继续进行时，你开始祈求死亡。

entries.name: Feature: Ex-Convict
entries: The knowledge gained during your incarceration lets you gain insight into local guards and jailors. You know which will accept bribes, or look the other way for you. You can also seek shelter for yourself from authorities with other criminals in the area. Note: This feature is a variant of the Courtier feature.

rows: 我是一个恶霸；其他人会像我一样受苦。
我总是说 "是"，即使我的意思是 "不"，这只是更容易。
我的目标是行为不端。
我不顾一切地去挫败或激怒那些当权者。
我努力遵守法律。我永远不会再犯违背权威的错误。
我总是把一切都计划好。有一次我让别人计划事情，结果我的结果并不理想。
我承担责任以保护他人免受痛苦。
我囤积信息，你永远不知道什么会派上用场。
损失。我自由地给那些冒犯我的人以被残酷地拒绝的东西，即死亡。(混沌)
献身精神。我从不背叛那些信任我的人。(法律)
复仇。我使用任何手段来获取我需要的信息；我已经得到了很好的教导。(邪恶)
赎罪。每个人都应该有第二次机会。(好)
坚韧不拔。我可以经受住任何挑战（任何）。
领导力。最好的团队是由那些被社会抛弃的人组成的。
我拿起武器，帮助建立一个自由的普兰。
我在斯托亚诺的恐怖经历萦绕在我的梦中，只有在一天的辛勤工作之后，我才能找到睡眠。
我对那些把我从监狱中释放出来的人心存感激，我将偿还这笔债务。
我的施虐者在使我获得自由的攻击中幸存下来，我将找到他/她。
当其他人遭受与我类似的命运时，我不会休息。
我正在寻找一种方法来治愈斯托亚诺的伤痕，包括身体和情感的伤痕。
在压力大的时候，我发现自己会无缘无故地哭。
我的神经末梢在审讯中被射中；除了最严厉的触摸，我对所有的东西都感到麻木。
我没有能力为自己站起来。
我在酷刑下折服了，并提供了我保证会保密的信息。如果别人发现了，我的生命就会受到威胁。
生存比友谊更有价值。
我过去的幽灵阻碍了我的行动。

items.name: Skill Proficiencies:
items.entry: Two of the following: {@skill Perception}, {@skill Survival}, {@skill Stealth}, {@skill Athletics}

items.name: Tool Proficiencies:
items.entry: Cook's utensils, one other set of artisan's tools

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: {@item Cook's utensils|PHB}, {@item climber's kit|PHB}, a {@item shovel|PHB}, a pair of thick gloves, a cloak with a hood.

rows: Being alone for so long means I am very used to conversing with myself out loud.
I eat things that others find disgusting. I have learned to love the delicacies of scavenged food in the ruins.
I have many scars across my body from barely scraping by.
I am missing a finger on one hand due to a horrible encounter I had in the ruins.
I keep a locket of someone I lost in the ruins. I stare at it every night before I fall asleep to remember what I am looking for.
I keep souvenirs of the monsters I have bested in these ruins, to remind myself how strong I truly am.
I can sleep just about anywhere, nothing really phases me anymore.
I often recite the names of people I used to know and lost so I can hold on to their memory.

entries.name: Feature: Makeshift Meals
entries: You know how to purify food and rations found in the ruins. When you take a short rest, you prepare a meal for a number of creatures equal to your proficiency bonus. Creatures who consume the food regain hit points equal to your level. Once they do, they can't regain hit points from another one of your meals until they finish a long rest.

entries.caption: Suggested Characteristics
rows: I always have an exit strategy in mind if things go poorly.
You can't survive in this grim city without a good sense of humor, but I have a taste for gallows humor.
I try to work in the thin grey area between the squabbling factions, squeezing under their radar when possible. The less I am seen, the better.
If you spot danger, it is best to avoid it, that's how you survive.
Drakkenheim is a dangerous place. But I can navigate it with my eyes closed. No one else I've ever met is as good as I am.
In order to survive the monsters of Drakkenheim, one must be a monster of Drakkenheim.
Take everything you can from the dead, take it from the living if you can. If you are to survive, you must take any opportunity to scavenge.
I will never give up until I reclaim what I lost in these ruins.
Self-Reliance. I won't risk my life for others. Everyone must fend for themselves—better you than me. (Evil)
Bravery. I find the thrill of surviving the monsters and magics of Drakkenheim exhilarating and thrive on the chaos. (Chaotic)
Safety. Whatever I can do to keep myself fed and keep a safe place to rest is good in my books. (Any)
Helpful. People need all the help they can get in the city, and I know I can provide it. (Good)
Hope. I believe there is something worth saving here, we must hold on to the idea of a better future. (Good)
Responsibility. I lived here before the meteor, I'll live here long after. I must protect my home and do what I can to make it livable again. (Lawful)
I had family in these ruins. I know not what became of them, but I must find out.
This city is my home, and I will fight for what's left of it until the very end.
I'll do any dirty work in the city if it means a hot meal, a warm bed, or some good company.
I've spent so long in these ruins, its the outside world that terrifies me now.
Why haven't I left Drakkenheim? Have you seen how much gold there is to be made here?
I am bound to the throne of Drakkenheim, and fight to see it one day reclaimed.
Any meal could be my last. I'll eat just about anything. I do what I must to survive.
I don't like being outside the Haze of the city for too long, I've gotten used to it.
I am convinced my family is alive in the city somewhere. I hear their voices call to me at night.
I don't trust anyone easily. I'll sleep with one eye open even around my companions, for Drakkenheim makes monsters of us all.
The years spent here have turned me to a vice, I very much rely on that vice to get me through my days.
I hear voices constantly. Sometimes I get distracted with conversations with people who are not there.

_.special: small article of jewelry that is distinct to your tribe

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: {@item Herbalism kit|phb}, a small article of jewelry that is distinct to your tribe, a {@item hunting trap|phb}, a set of {@item common clothes|phb}, and a belt {@item pouch|phb} containing 5 gp

entries.name: Lifestyle
entries: Poor

entries.name: Overview
entries: You were born into a nomadic tribe that called the Ticklebelly Hills home. You migrated from location to location, living off the land with your tribe. The tribe would seasonally travel south into the Grass Sea and the Giant's Cairn, north into the Dragonspine Mountains, and even occasionally east across the Stojanow River to the borders of the Quivering forest.

In your migrations, your people have come to know the stone giant tribes that populate the Giant's Cairn. The dragon cultists came to the hills one day—magic-users wearing purple and riding horrid beasts, black-clad warriors wearing wicked masks, and even soldiers from the nearby town of Phlan. Then the dragon called Vorgansharax arrived and laired in the hills, causing horrid thickets to grow and animals to act unusually. The cultists began raiding nomad camps for victims to offer to the wyrm. Eventually, the dragon moved on to attack Phlan, but life was never again the same for the nomads of the Ticklebelly Hills.

entries.name: Feature: At Home in the Wild
entries: The wilderness is your home and you are comfortable dwelling in it. You can find a place to hide, rest, or recuperate when out in the wild. This place of rest is secure enough to conceal you from most natural threats. Threats that are supernatural, magical, or are actively seeking you out might do so with difficulty depending on the nature of the threat (as determined by the DM). However, this feature doesn't shield or conceal you from scrying, mental probing, nor from threats that don't necessarily require the five senses to find you. Note: This feature is a variant of the Folk Hero feature.

entries.name: Suggested Characteristics
entries: Ticklebelly nomads only venture into civilization when necessary. You are social within your tribe, with tribes of other nomads, and even with the stone giant tribes that populate the Giant's Cairn. However, other communities tend to either put you on your guard or put you in a state of wonder. Was it this wonder that enticed you into a life of adventuring? On the other hand, you are fiercely protective of and dedicated to your tribe. Perhaps it was this dedication that led you to venture out; either of your own will or at the behest of your tribe's leaders.

rows: 我急切地将自己注入未知的世界。
村庄、城镇和城市都不适合我。我宁愿在任何时候都在野外。
我有效地完成我的任务，尽可能少地使用资源。
我很难在一个地方停留很长时间。
我一有机会就大声地吹嘘我的部落。
我曾在巨人中行走，面对更大的生物，我无所畏惧。
我很安静、矜持，但观察力强。没有什么能逃过我的眼睛。
我的话就是我的纽带。我看到一个承诺的完成，即使它与我的信仰冲突。
亲情。家庭在生活中是最重要的。虽然我可能远离自己的家人，但在其他人的生活中也必须保护家庭的纽带。(好)
保全。自然不能被侵占的文明所掠夺。(任何)
漫游癖。人必须通过看世界和探索来扩大自己的视野。(混沌)
隔离。我的部落和它的方式必须得到保护，免受外界影响。(中立)
保护。对土地和人民的威胁必须不惜一切代价予以处理。(法律)
Belonging: All creatures have a place in the world, so I strive to help others find theirs. (Good)
我很想回到我的部落和我离开的家庭，但在我的义务得到履行之前，我不能这样做。
入侵我故乡的龙族崇拜者抢走了我部落的一个人。在我找到他们之前，我不会知道休息。
龙在山上的存在破坏了有价值的领地，导致我的部落中有人死亡。这个生物必须为它的所作所为付出代价。
我带着一个饰品，在精神和情感上将我与我的人民和我的家园联系在一起。
在我的部落游荡期间，我在山上发现了一个奇怪的遗物。我必须发现它是什么。
巨人巢穴中的一个石巨人部族给我留下了亲属关系的标记。
我把自己和我的朋友投入到各种情况中，很少考虑到后果。
陌生的人和环境让我感到紧张。
我对慢吞吞的人和那些证明优柔寡断的人绝对没有耐心。
我对体验新事物的渴望导致我做出不安全的选择。
我过度保护自然，有时会损害我的同伴和自己。
在社交、商业和敌对的情况下，我缺乏世故，常常证明我是失败的。

_.displayName: Sheriff's insignia (badge) a set of fine clothes

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: {@item Thieves' tools|phb}, a gray cloak, Sheriff's insignia (badge) a set of {@item fine clothes|phb}, and 17 gp

entries.name: Lifestyle
entries: 谦逊的

entries.name: Overview
entries: 你是众多确保贸易路线在任何时候都畅通的人之一。你保证贸易大法不惜一切代价得到遵守。你一个人或一组人去平息那些可能阻止贸易路线通行的土匪和强盗。你调查潜在的伏击和关于有人想抢劫或阻止商队的可能传闻。你是一个调查员，就像你是一个执法者一样。
你能够进入希尔斯法尔地区附近的城镇/村庄，找到一个愿意给你提供从传闻到事实的信息的联系人。这有时需要付出1-9个银币的小额贿赂的代价。

entries.name: Feature: Investigative Services
entries: You are part of a small force outside of Hillsfar. You have a special way of communicating with others and they seem to be at ease around you. You can invoke your rank to allow you access to a crime scene or to requisition equipment or horses on a temporary basis. When you enter a town or village around Hillsfar you can identify a contact who will give you information on the local rumors and would help you simply because of your desire to get answers and information for anyone wanting to disrupt trade. Note: This feature is a variant of the soldier feature.

rows: 我总是彬彬有礼，尊重他人
我让我的行动自己说话
我被我的过去所困扰，因为我看到了一个亲密的朋友或家人被谋杀，这是我一直需要解决的一个案件，但却一直无法解决。
我判断得快，平反得慢
我可以非常有说服力，并且能够在其他人可能无法做到的地方提出问题。
我有一个古怪的个性，似乎让别人失去警惕。
我的幽默感被大多数人认为是尴尬的。
每个人都有选择，他们总能做出正确的选择，我的选择！"。
希望。我的工作是为受害者说话（好）。
专心致志。一旦我开始调查，直到被告知这样做，我不会放弃，不管它导致什么。(合法的)
国家。我的城市、国家、或人民都是重要的。(任何)
雇佣兵。当我进行调查时，我希望立即得到答案。(任何)
口才好的人。我用我的话语来动摇别人，让他们给我答案。(好)
权力。我是通过威胁和武力来获得我的答案。(合法的)
时至今日，未解决的案件总会让我魂牵梦绕，困扰不已。
通过我的人格力量，我将解决一个调查或难题。
我有权相信我想要的东西，只是试图阻止我。
我需要向我的警长同事证明我的价值
我所关心的人在可疑的情况下死亡。我将查出他们的遭遇，并将凶手绳之以法。
我为那些不能为自己说话的人说话。
我总是过分夸大我的能力。
我不忍心让我关心的人离开我的视线。
我接受了贿赂以阻止调查，我愿意做任何事情来保持秘密。
我对那些智力/种族 "低下 "的人不太尊重。
我总是喜欢喝杯好的麦芽酒......或者五杯来掩盖我的过去。
我代表希尔斯法尔的第一领主说话，并确保每个人都知道这一点。

_.special: dark clothes with a hood and a face covering

_.displayName: signet ring of a fake lord

items.name: Skill Proficiencies:
items.entry: {@skill Investigation} and one choice from the following: {@skill Stealth}, {@skill Insight}, or {@skill Perception}

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: {@item Thieves' tools|PHB}, a set of dark clothes with a hood and a face covering. A {@item signet ring|PHB} of a fake lord, a fake identification, a set of weighted dice, and a deck of cards

rows: You keep a cryptic map to a lost treasure that you have always wanted to uncover.
You have a coin that is heads on both sides, helpful for winning a chance game.
You have a magnifying spyglass you use to examine items.
You have a ring that opens to reveal a small compartment inside.
Your left boot has a compartment for a hidden dagger.
You carry an old compass that doesn't point north, you hope it points towards a great treasure.
You have a collection of exotic coins and medals that are of personal value to you.
You have a rival treasure hunter who used to be a partner. You parted ways years ago.

entries.name: Feature: Detail-Oriented
entries: You double your proficiency bonus when making any ability check to search the ruins of Drakkenheim.

entries.caption: Suggested Characteristics
rows: I believe that I am destined for greatness, and nothing can convince me otherwise.
I always have a plan or plot to outwit my foes. It may not always be good, but it's almost always overly complex.
I love to flaunt my wealth and showcase the things I have bought with it.
I pay no mind to the risks of a situation. I always bet on myself and my abilities and it's gotten me this far. Never tell me the odds.
I have a quip, allegory, or joke for almost any situation.
I lie about anything and everything. I lie for almost no reason at all, sometimes just to see if I can fool the people around me.
I use flattery and honeyed words to get what I want.
I can't help it if valuable objects lying around end up in my pockets. It's for safe keeping.
Independent. No one tells me what to do. I make my own rules, and my own luck. (Chaotic)
Fair. I do not take anything from anyone who couldn't afford to lose it. I am a treasure hunter, not a thief. (Lawful)
Family. I care about material possessions and wealth, but not as much as I care about my friends and family. (Good)

Aspiration. Wealth is power. Wealth means you will be remembered. In this world making a name for yourself is as simple as acquiring enough gold to buy your way to victory. I intend to be remembered. (Any)
Danger. Every great discovery requires risk. The greater the risk, the greater the reward. It's the thrill of the hunt that I live for. (Any)
Dignity. The dead and their prized belongings deserve more than to waste away in the ruins. They deserve to be found, remembered, and taken care of. (Lawful)
My desire for wealth is out of a need to protect my family.
Something important to me was stolen. I've longed to get it back ever since.
I'm wanted for my many crimes and hope that where I am going, the law will not follow.
I made mistakes in my past that cost me the life of someone I loved. I will not let that happen again.
I plan to be the greatest thief or most cunning explorer of all time.
This is my last job, the big one. After this I hope to settle down with my wealth, maybe start a family.
My entire identity is layers of falsities presented to hide my true self, for I am not a good person. I've never told the truth for as long as I can remember and it's too late now to stop.
Every situation, every person, is only as valuable to me as what I can gain from them. I'm not afraid to pull strings to bend luck in my favour.
I jump to defensive measures as soon as someone catches me in a lie, or tries to call me out for anything.
I take what I want, and I want it all.
I like to show my skills, talk big, and take big risks in the hopes of impressing everyone watching.
I know for a fact I am the smartest person in the room, and if people are suggesting anything otherwise they are terribly mistaken.

items.name: Skill Proficiencies:
items.entry: Choose two from among {@skill Deception}, {@skill Insight}, {@skill Persuasion}, and {@skill Stealth}

items.name: Tool Proficiencies:
items.entry: Choose two from among one type of {@filter gaming set|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=gaming set}, one {@filter musical instrument|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument}, and {@item thieves' tools|phb}

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: A set of clothes appropriate to your duties and a {@item pouch|phb} containing 20 gp

entries.name: Feature: Ear to the Ground
entries: 你经常与你选择的采石场所经过的社会阶层的人接触。这些人可能与黑社会犯罪有关，也可能是街头的粗人，或是上流社会的成员。这种联系是以你所访问的任何城市的联系人的形式出现的，这个人提供关于当地的人和地方的信息。

entries.name: Suggested Characteristics
entries: Use the tables for the {@background criminal} background in the Player's Handbook as the basis for your bounty hunter's traits and motivations, modifying the entries when appropriate to suit your identity as a bounty hunter.
例如，你的纽带可能涉及其他赏金猎人或雇用你的组织或个人。你的理想可能与你总是抓住猎物的决心有关，或者与你保持你可靠的声誉的愿望有关。

_.special: map of the city you grew up in
token to remember your parents by

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: A small knife, a map of the city you grew up in, a pet mouse, a token to remember your parents by, a set of {@item common clothes|phb}, and a belt {@item pouch|phb} containing 10 gp

entries.name: Feature: City Secrets
entries: 你知道城市的秘密模式和流程，并能在城市的蔓延中找到其他人会错过的通道。当你不在战斗中时，你（和你带领的同伴）可以在城市的任何两个地点之间旅行，其速度是你正常速度的两倍。

entries.name: Suggested Characteristics
entries: 乌龟是由绝望的贫困生活塑造的，有好有坏。他们往往被对与他们一起在街头生活的人的承诺所驱使，或者被寻找更好的生活的强烈愿望所驱使--也许对所有对他们不好的富人进行一些报复。

rows: 我把食物残渣和小饰品藏在口袋里。
我问了很多问题。
我喜欢挤在小地方，别人无法接近我。
我背靠着墙或树睡觉，把我的一切都包在怀里，一捆一捆的。
我吃东西像猪一样，而且不懂礼貌。
我认为任何对我好的人都是隐藏着邪恶的意图。
我不喜欢洗澡。
我直言不讳地说出了别人所暗示或隐藏的东西。
尊重。所有的人，无论贫富，都值得尊重。(好)
社区。我们必须互相照顾，因为没有人愿意这样做。(合法的)
变化。低下的人被抬起来，高大的人被打倒。变化是事物的本质。(混沌)
报应。需要让富人知道贫民窟里的生与死是什么样子。(邪恶)
人。我帮助那些帮助我的人--这就是让我们活着的原因。(中立)
愿望。我要证明我值得拥有更好的生活。(任意)
我的城镇或城市是我的家，我将为捍卫它而战。
我赞助了一家孤儿院，以避免其他人承受我被迫承受的痛苦。
我的生存归功于另一个顽童，他教会了我如何在街头生活。
我欠了一个我永远无法偿还的债，那就是对我表示同情的人。
我通过抢劫一个重要人物摆脱了贫穷的生活，我因此被通缉。
没有人应该忍受我所经历的艰难困苦。
如果我寡不敌众，我会在战斗中逃跑。
黄金对我来说似乎是一大笔钱，为了更多的黄金，我几乎可以做任何事情。
我永远不会完全信任除自己以外的任何人。
我宁愿在睡梦中杀了人，也不愿意公平战斗。
如果我比别人更需要它，这就不是偷窃。
不能照顾自己的人得到他们应得的东西。

b.special: set of tattoos marking your loyalty to Uthgar and your tribal totem

items.name: Tool Proficiencies:
items.entry: One type of {@filter musical instrument|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument} or {@filter artisan's tools|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=artisan's tools}

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: A {@item hunting trap|phb}, a totemic token or set of tattoos marking your loyalty to Uthgar and your tribal totem, a set of {@item traveler's clothes|phb}, and a {@item pouch|phb} containing 10 gp

entries.name: Feature: Uthgardt Heritage
entries: 你不仅对你的部落领地有很好的了解，而且对北方其他地区的地形和自然资源也很了解。你对任何荒野地区都足够熟悉，在那里觅食时，你能找到比平时多一倍的食物和水。
此外，你还可以呼唤你的族人以及与你的部落结盟的人的款待，通常包括德鲁伊圈子的成员、游牧精灵部落、哈珀人以及献给第一圈神的祭司们。

entries.name: Suggested Characteristics
entries: Use the tables for the {@background outlander} background in the Player's Handbook as the basis for your traits and motivations, modifying the entries when appropriate to suit your identity as a member of an Uthgardt tribe.
即使你已经离开了你的部落（至少是现在），你仍然坚持你的人民的传统。你永远不会砍伐一棵仍然活着的树，你也不允许在你面前做出这种行为。乌斯加特的祖冢--图腾之灵被乌斯加击败的大山，以及部落英雄们被埋葬的地方--对你们来说是神圣的。
你的纽带无疑与你的部落或乌斯加德哲学或文化的某些方面有关（甚至可能是乌斯加本人）。你的理想是一种个人的选择，可能与你的族人的精神气质紧密相连，当然也不会与作为乌斯加德人所代表的东西相矛盾或妥协。

_.special: uniform in the style of your unit and indicative of your rank

_.displayName: horn with which to summon help

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: A uniform in the style of your unit and indicative of your rank, a {@item horn|phb} with which to summon help, a set of {@item manacles|phb}, and a {@item pouch|phb} containing 10 gp

entries.name: Feature: Watcher's Eye
entries: 你在执法和与违法者打交道方面的经验，使你对当地的法律和犯罪分子有了一定的了解。你可以很容易地找到当地的哨所或类似的组织，也可以很容易地找出社区中的犯罪活动窝点，尽管你更有可能在前者而不是后者受到欢迎。

entries.name: Suggested Characteristics
entries: Use the tables for the {@background soldier} background in the Player's Handbook as the basis for your traits and motivations, modifying the entries when appropriate to suit your identity as a member of the city watch.
你的纽带很可能与你的同伴或观察组织本身有关，而且几乎肯定与你的社区有关。你的理想可能涉及促进和平与安全。一个调查员很可能有一个理想，那就是通过成功破案来实现正义。

items.name: Variant: Myriad Operative
entries: Your skill set might be similar to that of many members of the {@book Clasp|TDCSR|2|The Clasp}, but you work for a criminal organization that is far more sophisticated—and even less scrupulous. As a {@book Myriad|TDCSR|2|The Myriad} operative in Tal'Dorei, you might have been given a specific task that furthers that syndicate's hunger to expand beyond Wildemount, or which gives them an edge in their rivalry with the {@book Clasp|TDCSR|2|The Clasp}. Moreover, you understand the wisdom of keeping your activities secret from fellow criminals as well as law enforcement, since the agents of the {@book Clasp|TDCSR|2|The Clasp} will show you no mercy if your true identity is ever revealed.

background.name: Variant Continental Nobility (Last of the Line)

items.name: Feature: Spy Contact
entries: 你有一个可靠和值得信赖的联系人，他是你与其他间谍网络的联络人。你知道如何从你的联系人那里获得信息，即使是在很远的地方；具体来说，你知道当地的信使、腐败的商队老板和肮脏的水手，他们可以为你传递信息。

items.name: Tool Proficiencies:
items.entry: {@item Disguise kit|phb}, one type of {@filter musical instrument|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument}

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: An inexpensive but unusual weapon, such as a {@item trident|phb} or {@item net|phb} (one of your choice), the favor of an admirer (love letter, lock of hair, or trinket), {@item costume clothes|phb}, and a belt {@item pouch|phb} containing 15 gp

items.name: Feature: By Popular Demand
entries: 你总能在任何以战斗为娱乐的地方找到一个表演的地方--也许是角斗场或秘密的坑道格斗俱乐部。在这样的地方，只要你每晚表演，你就能得到免费的住宿和适度或舒适的食物（取决于场所的质量）。此外，你的表演使你成为当地的一个人物。当陌生人在你表演过的城镇认出你时，他们通常会对你产生好感。

items.name: Tool Proficiencies:
items.entry: One type of {@filter artisan's tools|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=artisan's tools}, or {@item navigator's tools|phb}, or an additional language

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: A set of {@filter artisan's tools|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=artisan's tools} (one of your choice) or a {@item mule|phb} and {@item cart|phb}, a letter of introduction from your guild, a set of {@item traveler's clothes|phb}, and a belt {@item pouch|phb} containing 15 gp

items.name: Feature: Retainers
entries: You have the service of three retainers loyal to your family. These retainers can be attendants or messengers, and one might be a majordomo. {@b One of your retainers is a noble who serves as your squire, aiding you in exchange for training on his or her own path to knighthood} (This person could be your bond.). Your two remaining retainers might include a groom to care for your horse and a servant who polishes your armor (and even helps you put it on).
你的家臣可以为你执行平凡的任务，但他们不会为你战斗，不会跟随你进入明显的危险区域（如地下城），如果他们经常受到威胁或虐待，他们会离开。

items.name: Variant Noble (Knight)
entries: 在大多数社会中，骑士是最低的贵族头衔之一，但它可以是通往更高地位的途径。如果你想成为一名骑士，请选择 "保留者 "功能而不是 "特权地位 "功能。
作为骑士精神和宫廷爱情理想的象征，你可以在你的装备中加入一面旗帜或其他来自贵族老爷或夫人的信物，你已经把你的心交给了他们，这是一种贞洁的奉献。

items.name: Feature: Retainers
entries: You have the service of three retainers loyal to your family. These retainers can be attendants or messengers, and one might be a majordomo. Your retainers are commoners who can perform mundane tasks for you, but they do not fight for you, will not follow you into obviously dangerous areas (such as dungeons), and will leave if they are frequently endangered or abused.

items.name: Feature: Bad Reputation
entries: 无论你走到哪里，人们都会因为你的名声而害怕你。当你在一个文明的定居点时，你可以逃脱轻微的刑事犯罪，如在酒馆拒绝支付食物或在当地商店砸门，因为大多数人不会向当局报告你的活动。

background.name: Variant Survivor (Veteran of the Civil War)

items.name: Variant: Grey Hunter
entries: As elite as they are, the members of the {@book Whitestone Rifle Corps|TDCSR|3|Whitestone Rifle Corps} do not represent the apex of firearms skill in {@book Whitestone|TDCSR|3|Whitestone}. A clandestine group of elite soldiers and survivalists is drawn secretly from the Rifle Corps ranks. Called the {@book Grey Hunters|TDCSR|3|Grey Hunters}, these soldiers are special operatives of the de Rolo family, and loyally serve as spies, bodyguards, and even assassins when the job requires it. Though few officially know of them, rumors of the {@book Grey Hunters'|TDCSR|3|Grey Hunters} existence swirl constantly throughout the city-state, often in response to their activities after having been loaned out to protect {@book Whitestone's|TDCSR|3|Whitestone} allies.

You are one of these {@book Grey Hunters|TDCSR|3|Grey Hunters}, even if just a trainee (if you're starting your campaign at low levels). You have the ear of the lord and lady of {@book Whitestone|TDCSR|3|Whitestone}, though you must exercise this privilege graciously lest you lose it.

items.name: Tool Proficiencies:
items.entry: One type of {@filter artisan's tools|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=artisan's tools}, one type of {@filter musical instrument|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument}

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: A set of {@filter artisan's tools|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=artisan's tools} or a {@filter musical instrument|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument} (one of your choice), a scroll of your god's teachings, a vizier's cartouche, a set of {@item fine clothes|phb}, and a {@item pouch|phb} containing 25 gp

entries.name: Feature: Voice of Authority
entries: 你的声音就是你的神的声音，至少在理论上如此。你的工作可能包括训练和指导入门者，他们必须服从你。在任何情况下，入会者都应该听从你的声音，服从你的命令。不过，如果你滥用这一权力，你的神可能会亲自惩罚你。

entries.name: Suggested Characteristics
entries: 宰相的特点强烈反映了他们所服务的神的理想和个性。

rows: Everything I do, I do gracefully and deliberately, and with complete confidence. (Oketra)
Nothing can shake my rock-hard focus. (Oketra)
When I am at peace, I am an oasis of perfect calm in the world. When I am roused to anger, I am an embodiment of terror. (Kefnet)
I enjoy teasing acolytes and initiates with juicy tidbits of knowledge wrapped up in fiendishly difficult puzzles. (Kefnet)
我对自己和自己的能力有最大的信心。(罗纳斯)
当城市的生活感觉太温顺、太安全时，我就会感到不安。(罗纳斯)
我喜欢独处，因为这是计划我的胜利的机会。(邦图)
我用讽刺的方式来破坏其他神的教义。(邦图)
I love, fight, and feast with equal zeal. (Hazoret)
I think of those in my care as my family, in a way that most people have trouble understanding. (Hazoret)
{@b Solidarity.} The worthy must respect the worthy. In the afterlife, all will be united in goal and action. (Oketra)
{@b Knowledge.} The worthy shall cultivate a nimble mind, so as to perceive the wonders beyond imagination that wait in the afterlife. (Kefnet)
{@b Strength.} The worthy shall hone a strong body that can withstand the boundless energies of the afterlife. (Rhonas)
{@b Ambition.} The worthy shall strive for greatness, for supremacy in life leads to supremacy in the afterlife. (Bontu)
{@b Zeal.} The worthy shall rush to the God-Pharaoh's side with relentless passion, rising to overcome every obstacle in their way. (Hazoret)
{@b Naktamun.} The life of the city is ordered according to the plan of the God-Pharaoh, and that order must be preserved at all costs.
My loyalty to my companions embodies the ideal of loyalty to my god. (Oketra)
The teachings of my god are more precious to me than any possession. (Kefnet)
为了保卫我的神庙不受任何伤害或亵渎，我愿意做任何事。(罗纳斯)
我致力于为我的神服务--因为这是我进入来世的可靠门票。(邦图)
I love my god and never want my service to end. (Hazoret)
我有一个亲密的朋友或爱人，他也是一个维齐尔。
我爱上了一个初学者，我想在试验中保护这个人免于死亡。
我暗暗希望自己没有被选为宰相，这样我就可以作为入门者参加试验了。
我暗自怀疑，神灵是否完全关心我们或我们所做的事情。
另一个神的宰相为了报复过去的侮辱而要杀我。
我对通往来世之门外的东西感到恐惧。
我暗自相信神-法老的回归不会给这个世界带来祝福。

items.name: Feature: Shelter of Dissenters
entries: 如果他们希望有任何生存的希望，无论是躲在城市里还是被赶到沙漠里，持不同政见者必须互相帮助。你可以在其他持异议者中找到一个藏身、休息或休养的地方。他们会帮助你躲避那些追捕你的人，甚至可能为你冒生命危险。

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: A set of {@item common clothes|phb}, a black cloak with a hood, a {@item poisoner's kit|phb}, and a {@item pouch|phb} containing 10 gp

entries.name: Feature: Shadow Network
entries: You have access to the Volstrucker shadow network, which allows you to communicate with other members of the order over long distances. If you write a letter in a special arcane ink, address it to a member of the Volstrucker, and cast it into a fire, the letter will burn to cinders and materialize whole again on the person of the agent you addressed it to.
用来在影子网络中寄信的墨水与巫师在法术书中刻画法术所用的墨水相同。用这种墨水写信，每页要花费10金币。

entries.name: Suggested Characteristics
entries: Agents of the Volstrucker are groomed to follow orders without question and to kill without mercy. The trauma that brings one into the order can fester even more strongly against the darkness of a Volstrucker agent's assignments. Officially, no one ever leaves the order—but those desperate enough do whatever it takes to gain some measure of freedom.

rows: 我宁愿把我的想法留给自己。
我过度放纵恶习，以平息我的良知。
我已经把情感抛在脑后。我现在非常平和。
过去的一些事件一直在我脑海中蠕动，使我坐立不安。
我总是遵守我的诺言--除非当我被命令违背诺言。
我对侮辱一笑置之，从不把它们放在心上。
秩序。王室的意志是绝对的。(法律)
真正的忠心。地狱犬议会比任何权力都要大，甚至是王权。(法律)
死亡。对不忠的惩罚是死亡。(邪恶)
决心。我不能失败。永远不会。(中立)
恐惧。人们不应该尊重权力。他们应该害怕它。(邪恶)
逃跑。沃尔斯特鲁克家族是纯粹的邪恶！我无法为我为他们所做的一切赎罪，但我可以用我的生命来逃脱。(任何)
工作是最重要的。我将看到它通过。
我的命令很重要，但我的战友们比什么都重要。我愿意为他们而死。
我所做的一切，都是为了保护我身边的人。
如果帝国倒下，所有的文明都会随之倒下。我将不惜一切代价挡住混乱和野蛮的局面。
我喝酒以减轻后脑勺的疼痛。
我一看到血就会有点发狂。
我可以听到我所杀的每个人的声音。我看到他们的脸。我无法摆脱这些幽灵。
恐惧是一个强大的动力。我将不惜一切代价，防止那些知道我是什么的人看到我失败，也防止我关心的人知道我是什么。

_.special: skin of fine zzar or wine

items.name: Tool Proficiencies:
items.entry: One type of {@filter gaming set|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=gaming set} or {@filter musical instrument|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument}

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: A set of {@item fine clothes|phb}, a {@item signet ring|phb} or brooch, a scroll of pedigree, a skin of fine zzar or wine, and a purse containing 20 gp

entries.name: Feature: Kept in Style
entries: 当你在沃特德普或北方的其他地方时，你的房子会满足你的日常需要。你的名字和徽章足以支付你的大部分费用；你经常光顾的旅店、酒馆和宴会厅很乐意记录你的债务，并将账目送到你在沃特德的家族产业，以解决你的债务。
这个好处使你能够过上舒适的生活方式，而不必每天为此支付2个金币，或者将富裕或贵族生活方式的成本降低到这个数额。你不能维持不那么富裕的生活方式，并将其差额作为收入使用--这项福利是一种信用额度，而不是实际的金钱奖励。

entries.name: Suggested Characteristics
entries: Use the tables for the {@background noble} background in the Player's Handbook as the basis for your traits and motivations, modifying the entries when appropriate to suit your identity as a member of a Waterdhavian family.
像其他贵族一样，你出生和成长在一个不同于大多数人所知的世界--一个赋予你特权但也要求你履行与你的地位相称的责任的世界。你的纽带可能只与你的家族有关，也可能与另一个与你的家族站在一起或对立的贵族家族有关。你的理想在某种程度上取决于你如何看待自己在家族中的角色，以及你打算如何作为家族的代表在整个世界上行事。

items.name: Skill Proficiencies:
items.entry: Your choice of two of the following: {@skill Athletics}, {@skill Perception}, or {@skill Survival}

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: Your choice of a {@item musket} or a {@item pistol}, a set of {@item common clothes|phb}, and a {@item pouch|PHB} containing 10 gp

entries.name: Feature: Legacy of Secrecy
entries: You have been entrusted with the use and care of a weapon both powerful and terrifying. The rifle you wield might transform the face of warfare and life in Tal'Dorei. It is a weapon that haunts the mind of its creator, {@creature Percival de Rolo|TDCSR}, manifesting as a pain that lives always behind his kind eyes.

You were granted a {@item musket} or a {@item pistol} by your commander in the {@book Whitestone Rifle Corps|TDCSR|3|Whitestone Rifle Corps}. This weapon is a symbol of your status, and when you display it, other folk around you—particularly adventurers, mercenaries, guards, engineers, and weapons enthusiasts—treat you differently. You might be seen as a noble defender of the people, a selfish hoarder of power, or anything in between, at the GM's discretion.

entries.name: Feature: Rifle Corps Relationship
entries: You are—or were—a member of an elite and trusted band of {@book Whitestone's|TDCSR|3|Whitestone} staunchest defenders. Work with your GM to determine your current relationship with the Rifle Corps. If your campaign starts in {@book Whitestone|TDCSR|3|Whitestone}, you might be an active member of that unit. Otherwise, you can use the Rifle Corps Relationships table for suggestions.

entries.caption: Rifle Corps Relationships
rows: I retired honorably from the Rifle Corps—and now it's time for me to pursue my own adventures.
I'm on an important mission to protect {@book Whitestone|TDCSR|3|Whitestone} or guard one of our allies.
{@book Whitestone|TDCSR|3|Whitestone} is in trouble, and I was sent away to seek help.
I don't think firearms technology should be kept secret, so I escaped from the Rifle Corps with my weapon and am on the run.
I was on a mission with my company when I got separated from them. Now I need to find my way back home.
My weapon was stolen. I built a new one, but I can't return home until I've tracked down the thief and recovered the original. ({@book Whitestone Hunter|TDCSR|3|Grey Hunters} variant only)

entries.name: Suggested Characteristics
entries: Those who join the {@book Whitestone Rifle Corps|TDCSR|3|Whitestone Rifle Corps} become members of an elite and trusted band known as the city-state's staunchest defenders. But this means working with your GM to determine why you're not at home protecting {@book Whitestone|TDCSR|3|Whitestone}. Perhaps you took on a mission to guard someone on behalf of the de Rolo family, or you might have been separated from your company while on an assignment. Either way, you find yourself embroiled now in a series of new adventures as you try to make your way back home.

Your bond is likely associated with your comrades-in-arms or with {@book Whitestone|TDCSR|3|Whitestone} itself. Your ideal could be tied to justice or protection, but could also be a secretive, selfish perversion of those virtues.

entries.caption: Rifle Corps Personality Traits
rows: I want to make a good impression at all times. That means keeping my clothes and gear clean and in top condition.
I don't like being the center of attention. I'd rather let someone else do the talking while I watch their back.
I feel safe only if I'm carrying my trusty rifle. And my dagger. And my concealed pistol. Oh, and of course my....
I don't trust people with my secrets easily, so it feels like a big deal when someone else shares a secret with me.
I like coming up with solutions to problems using my esoteric knowledge of natural philosophy.
Everyone around me takes things so seriously. Sometimes I just want to let loose and have fun!
Knowing things that other people don't know makes me feel special and important.
I'm most at home in woods and mountains, where everything feels at once familiar, always growing and changing.

entries.caption: Rifle Corps Ideals
rows: {@b Responsibility}. I have a duty to protect the people of {@book Whitestone|TDCSR|3|Whitestone} and to uphold the trust placed in me by the de Rolos. (Lawful)
{@b Militarization}. Everyone should have access to the most powerful weapons available, so they can defend themselves effectively. (Evil)
{@b Cooperation}. Any problem can be solved as long as people are willing to work together. (Good)
{@b Camaraderie}. It's important to have people you can trust to help out in a fight—and to uncork a bottle together afterward. (Any)
{@b Context}. There are no universal rights or wrongs. Every choice depends on the details of the situation. (Chaotic)
{@b Secrecy}. Information is valuable, but it can also be dangerous. I'll keep my mouth shut and gather as much intel as I can. (Neutral)

entries.caption: Rifle Corps Bons
rows: I never knew what to do with myself until I joined the Rifle Corps. Now I have a purpose and comrades to give me direction.
One of my fellow Rifle Corps soldiers saved my life—and then I saved theirs. That kind of bond lasts forever.

{@book Whitestone|TDCSR|3|Whitestone} is the best city in all of Tal'Dorei. Nowhere else has been blessed by the {@deity The Dawnfather|Exandria|TDCSR|Dawnfather} and has a clock that tracks the movement of the stars!
My quick thinking saved a noble from assassination, and she showed me great kindness in return. I daren't say it, but I'm more loyal to her than I am to the de Rolos.
My weapon is my life. I clean it, repair it, and care for it—and it serves me loyally in return.
The people of {@book Whitestone|TDCSR|3|Whitestone} cared for my family when we had nothing. I promise to repay their compassion with my service.

entries.caption: Rifle Corps Flaws
rows: Who cares about keeping this gun safe? "Don't let it fall into the wrong hands!" Ha! It's only a matter of time before someone slips up and these weapons are everywhere.
I think being part of the Rifle Corps is so cool. I love telling people about my position so I can impress them.
My weapon was stolen. I built a new one, but I can't return home until I've tracked down the thief and recovered the original.
I'm tired of protecting spoiled people who don't know how to protect themselves.
I shoot first and ask questions later.
The first and only time I killed someone, it changed my life. I still dream about it, and I'll never be the carefree person I was before.

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: A belaying pin ({@item club|phb}), a set of {@item traveler's clothes|PHB}, a {@item grappling hook|PHB}, {@item Hempen Rope (50 feet)|PHB|50 feet of hempen rope}, and a {@item pouch|phb} containing 10 gp

entries.name: Close Encounter
entries: You had a harrowing encounter with one of Wildspace's many terrors. You escaped with your life, but the encounter left you with a scar or two, or perhaps a recurring nightmare. Roll on the Close Encounter table to determine which creature nearly got the best of you. Creatures marked with an asterisk appear in {@book Boo's Astral Menagerie|BAM}; the others are described in the {@book Monster Manual|MM}.

entries.caption: Close Encounter
rows: {@creature Beholder}
{@creature Cosmic horror|BAM}*
{@creature Feyr|BAM}*
{@filter Lunar dragon|bestiary|source=BAM|search=lunar dragon}*
{@creature Mind flayer}
{@creature Neh-thalggu|BAM}*
{@creature Neogi|MPMM}*
{@creature Space clown|BAM}*
{@creature Vampirate|BAM}*
{@creature Void scavver|BAM}*

entries.name: Feature: Wildspace Adaptation
entries: You gain the {@feat Tough||Tough feat} from the {@book Player's Handbook|PHB}. In addition, you learned how to adapt to zero gravity. Being weightless doesn't give you disadvantage on any of your melee attack rolls (see "{@book Weightlessness|AAG|2|Weightlessness}" in {@book chapter 2|AAG|2}).

items.name: Languages
items.entry: you can speak as well as understand Auran

items.name: Equipment
items.entry: a wind {@filter Musical Instrument|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument} (one of your choice), an ornate cloak, a symbol of the wind, {@item common clothes|phb}, and a belt {@item pouch|phb} containing 10 gp

entries.name: Title and Blessing
entries: For some birdfolk, the moniker of Wind-Touched is merely a title, a symbol of their devotion to the wind and the natural world. Others have been told since birth that they were blessed by the wind, much in the way the Amaranthine Reya was in the old tales. Decide what your character believes, or roll on the table below to understand how they feel.

rows: I am truly blessed and have power over the wind itself.
I am devoted to the wind spirits, in action and title.
I believe in nature and goodness.
I will work tirelessly to earn the respect of those who give me this title.
I accept this honor but have my doubts.
I feel nothing for this title, and carry it against my will.

entries.name: Feature: Supernatural Presence
entries: Whether or not you are truly Wind-Touched, there are folk all across Everden that believe that you have been divinely blessed. If you make a show of power or skill that can be attributed to the wind or air, such as feats of acrobatics or commanding unseen forces, those believers will be bolstered by your supernatural presence. They will support you and, depending on how well you have convinced them of your powers, treat you with reverence and possibly even worship.

entries.name: Suggested Characteristics
entries: The wind-touched are revered by believers and scrutinized by skeptics. For better or worse, they find themselves in a world of expectations they struggle to live up to.

rows: I never back down from a challenge.
I always end up being the center of attention.
I am gifted by the wind and destined for greatness.
I have no time for those who doubt me.
I seek out challenges to test myself.
I am better than everyone else.
I avoid showing my power at all costs.
I remain humble despite my blessing.
Responsibility. The powers I have been gifted with are meant to serve the common good. (Good)
Heroism. The wind chose me to be a brave warrior and leader, so shall it be. (Lawful)
Egotism. My powers situate me above others. The masses should know their place. (Evil)
Mysticism. Connected to nature, I speak for the wind and divine its will for others. (Neutral)
Cynicism. What matters isn't whether or not my powers are genuine, but what advantages I can reap because of that belief. (Evil)
Naturalism. The wind speaks to my soul, and I am bound to go wherever it directs me. (Chaotic)
I am guided by a wise elder who prepares me for my destiny.
I am estranged from my parents who don't believe in my blessing.
I seek to discredit the person who burdened me with this moniker.
I live in the shadow of my mentor, seeking their approval.
I have a sibling who is not blessed, which causes tension
I am one with the wind. Personal relationships are fleeting.
I can't accept another's suggestion once I've set my path.
I expect nothing less than reverence from common people.
I blindly trust in the power of my blessing.
I am overly concerned about how others see me.
I will prove my worth, even if it means putting myself and my friends in danger.
I am burdened with responsibility, and find it hard to make even the simplest decisions.

entries.name: Coupled with Power
entries: While this background primarily focuses on the beliefs and perceptions of yourself and your community, pairing this background with a character who actually can manipulate the wind through magic could potentially set them up to become a holy figure, a prophet, or a fabled hero.

items.name: Tool Proficiencies:
items.entry: {@item Disguise kit|phb} or one type of {@filter musical Instrument|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument}

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: A {@item disguise kit|PHB} or a {@filter musical instrument|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=instrument} of your choice, a deck of cards, a carnival uniform or {@item costume clothes|phb|costume}, one trinket (determined by rolling on the {@item Feywild Trinket|WBtW|Feywild Trinkets}), and a {@item pouch|phb} containing 8 gp

entries.name: Feature: Carnival Fixture
entries: 巫师之光狂欢节为你提供免费、适度的住宿和食物。此外，你可以在狂欢节上闲逛，参与其中的许多奇迹，而不需要任何费用，只要你不扰乱其表演或造成任何其他麻烦。

entries.name: Carnival Companion
entries: Over the years, you have earned the friendship of another carnival fixture. Roll a {@dice d8} and consult the Carnival Companion table to determine whom or what you've befriended, or you can choose an option that you like. Work with your DM to flesh out this friendship. This companion hangs around you while you're in the carnival, but it won't voluntarily leave the carnival.

The DM can use the {@creature Witchlight Hand (Medium)|WBtW|Witchlight hand} stat block in {@adventure chapter 1|WBtW|1} to represent hands, performers, and animal trainers who serve as carnival companions. Statistics for the other companions appear in the {@book Monster Manual|MM}.

entries.caption: Carnival Companion
rows: 老成持重的巫师之手
年轻、易受影响的巫光之手
表演者（如杂技演员、小丑或音乐家）。
退休的表演者
经验丰富的动物训练师
Old {@creature blink dog}
Cheery {@creature sprite}
无害的魔法光缕（不需要状态块），飞行速度为30英尺，可以盘旋，在5英尺范围内发出亮光，在另外5英尺范围内发出暗光。

entries.name: Character Traits
entries: As the players choose backgrounds for their characters, they can use the following tables to help determine their characters' personality traits, ideals, bonds, and flaws. Players can use these tables instead of the ones that appear in the {@book Player's Handbook|PHB}, or they can mix and match them. If a rolled result doesn't make sense for a character, the player can roll again or choose a more appropriate entry on the table.
These tables, while optional, are well suited to Feywild-themed adventures and are ideal for any character who has the feylost or Witchlight hand background.

entries.caption: Personality Traits
rows: 我被只有我自己能听到的精灵般的笑声所困扰，尽管我知道那只是我的思想在作怪。
就像一个游牧民族，我无法在一个地方安顿很长时间。
好的音乐让我像婴儿一样流泪。
无论我走到哪里，我都试图把家里的一点温暖和宁静带过来。
我从未失去过孩子般的惊奇感。
当我有一个新的想法时，我会为之疯狂地兴奋，直到我想出另一个更好的想法。
我按照我自己的一套古怪而奇妙的规则生活。
我不能让自己相信大多数成年人。

entries.caption: Ideals
rows: 友谊。我从未离开过朋友。(好)
同情心。不应让任何生物受苦。(好)
浪迹天涯。我更喜欢走少有人走的路。(混沌)
变化性。变化是好的，这就是为什么我按照一套不断变化的规则生活。(混沌)
荣誉。交易就是交易，我绝不会破坏交易。(合法的)
三的规则。多元宇宙中的一切都以三为单位发生。我到处看到 "三的规则"。(合法的)
痴迷。我不会放过怨恨。(邪恶)
贪婪。为了得到我想要的东西，我会不惜一切代价，不管可能造成的伤害。(邪恶)

entries.caption: Bonds
rows: 我永远不会违背我的承诺。
我发现各种形式的魔法都很有吸引力。一个地方越是神奇，我就越是被它吸引。
我尽我所能来保护自然界。
对我来说，一个值得信赖的朋友是多元宇宙中最重要的东西。
我不能让自己伤害费伊生物，要么是因为我认为自己是费伊生物，要么是因为我害怕反作用力。
巫师之光狂欢节给我的感觉就像家一样。
我被吸引到仙境，渴望回到那里，哪怕只是短暂的停留。
I feel indebted to {@creature Mister Witch|WBtW} and {@creature Mister Light|WBtW} for giving me a home and a purpose.

entries.caption: Flaws
rows: 我很容易忘记时间。我的时间观念差意味着我总是迟到。
我认为整个多元宇宙都要来抓我。
我总是在紧张的时间线下工作，而且我对保持一切按计划进行很着迷。
我是个盗窃狂，觊觎闪闪发光的宝物。
我很健忘。有时我连最简单的事情都记不住。
我从不免费赠送任何东西，而且总是希望得到一些回报。
我有很多恶习，并倾向于放纵它们。
我总是在改变我的想法--嗯，几乎总是。

items.name: Equipment:
items.entry: A {@item Ink (1-ounce bottle)|PHB|bottle of black ink}, an {@item ink pen|PHB}, a book about plant identification, an {@item iron pot|PHB}, an {@item herbalism kit|PHB}, a school uniform, and a {@item pouch|phb} containing 15 gp

entries.name: Feature: Witherbloom Initiate
entries: You gain the {@feat Strixhaven Initiate|SCC} feat and must choose Witherbloom within it.

In addition, if you have the Spellcasting or Pact Magic feature, the spells on the Witherbloom Spells table are added to the spell list of your spellcasting class. (If you are a multiclass character with multiple spell lists, these spells are added to all of them.)

entries.caption: Witherbloom Spells
rows: 1st
{@spell Cure Wounds}, {@spell Inflict Wounds}
2nd
{@spell Lesser Restoration}, {@spell Wither and Bloom|SCC}
3rd
{@spell Revivify}, {@spell Vampiric Touch}
4th
{@spell Blight}, {@spell Death Ward}
5th
{@spell Antilife Shell}, {@spell Greater Restoration}

entries: Consider customizing how your spells look when you cast them. Your Witherbloom spells might rely on material components or a spellcasting focus drawn from the swamp environment of Witherbloom, and your spells might take on an appearance suggesting those natural elements. Spectral shapes of swamp animals or plants might form amid your spell effects.

entries.name: Building a Witherbloom Character
entries: Druids and warlocks make up most of Witherbloom's student body. A few wizards (mostly those who study the {@class Wizard|PHB|School of Necromancy|Necromancy|PHB}) and clerics (including those with the Divine Domains of {@class Cleric|PHB|Life|Life|PHB} or {@class Cleric|PHB|Nature|Nature|PHB}) also find their home in Witherbloom.
一些游侠和野蛮人也在威瑟布洛姆学习，一些流氓在这个学院学习期间学会了如何制造和使用毒药。

entries.name: Suggested Characteristics
entries: 威瑟布洛姆学院的学生同样有可能被发现为治疗酊剂采摘草药或骑着僵尸沼泽兽穿越河口。威瑟布洛姆的性格特征表为你的角色提供了各种可能的特征。

entries.caption: Witherbloom Personality Traits
rows: 我喜欢酝酿一个新的配方，即使有些人可能会对我选择的成分感到厌恶。或最后的产品。或者两者都是。
My fashion sense is like my garden: withered, black, and weird.
如果这是我做的最后一件事，我将与这片沼泽中的每一个怪物交朋友。
这个世界上的一切最终都会死亡。问题是，你将如何对待你所剩的时间？
我知道我们刚认识，但当你死后，我能拥有你的骨头吗？用于研究。
不要打断我，我正在沉思。

entries.name: Witherbloom Trinkets
entries: When you make your character, you may roll once on the Witherbloom Trinkets table, instead of on the {@item trinket|phb|Trinkets table} in the {@book Player's Handbook|PHB}, for your starting trinket.

entries.caption: Witherbloom Trinkets
rows: 一个黑色的鸟形面具，用发光的绿线修饰
一组兔子的骨头
一双厚厚的过膝涉水鞋，上面沾满了泥土和苔藓
一个黏糊糊的绿色触角，偶尔会蠕动一下
一个装有防水纸的笔记本
一条由五个小瓶组成的项链，每个小瓶都装满了发光的白色液体
